image:image.image:title: The Experiment
image:image.image:caption:
The Experiment (2017) presented by No Budget Films Starring Geren "G Sharp" Davis & Rayna Rodriguez with Jonathan Ashcraft and Michael Harris.
Johnny Larkin (Geren Davis- The Abstract Heart), a successful small business owner, is trying to find "Mrs. Right" after gaining the reputation as a 2-woman man, due to a recent date. He then meets Lisa (Rayna Rodriguez), a church-going social worker who seemingly is everything he is looking for. Things start off smooth, but soon they would both discover details of each other's recent past that compromise the relationship.. Determined to make things work, Johnny decides to use his charm, and a few tricks, to keep Lisa interested in him. But, Lisa had a plan of her own as well.

image:image.image:title: AQVA: VITA MUNDI
image:image.image:caption:
Un racconto della storia dell'acqua...del ciclo dell'acqua: un giro del mondo spettacolare passando dalle nubi al ghiaccio, dai torrenti ai fiumi e dal mare ai suoi organismi, per lo più, fatti del 70% di acqua! L'acqua è preziosa, in ogni sua forma... e l'essere umano rappresenta gran parte della causa per cui l'acqua, appunto, sta perdendo di valore e qualità. AQVA VITA MUNDI vuole essere una riflessione sul valore dell'acqua a tutto tondo e sul rapporto dell'uomo e della natura con essa.
REGIA: SIMONE MODUGNO CAMERA-DRONE: SIMONE MODUGNO TESTO-VOCE: SIMONE MODUGNO @2016 IL BLU DEL MARE COLONNA SONORA: Days are long - SILENT PARTNER Un ringraziamento speciale a: SML-SUB, GIO-SIM, INDUTEX SpA

image:image.image:title: The Ghost
image:image.image:caption: The main concept of the story behind our music video fits in the classic theme of Damsel in distress. A young woman in danger is fleeing away from the ghosts belonging to the most important representatives behind contemporary art, towards which we have an ambivalent attitude. They are all men and they are: Theodor. W. Adorno, Andy Warhol, Salvador Dali, Jackson Pollock, and the death is depicted by Marcel Duchamp. The video, recorded in Sweden, is inspired by Ingmar Bergman's "The seventh Seal", Maya Deren's videowork "Meshes of the afternoon" as well as the convention behind horror movies from the 50s. The theme behind a runaway girl in danger came to life from our need to juxtaposing Arnold van Genneps' concept of Rites of passage with Igor Stravinsky's Rites of Spring. The girl who is too good must die for the collective, for the rebirth of nature and art. Filmed in the following locations in Sweden: In Kungsbacka, in an abandoned amusement park - Fun City outside of Varberg and on Styrsö - a small island situated in Göteborg Municipality.

image:image.image:title: Let’s Get High with SmitHIcam
image:image.image:caption: SmitHIcam is the Smith HIGH camera support: With high camera position and a low grip, it is a simple, lightweight, and low-cost way to create video with reduced camera shake. It produces better results compared to when a camera is hand-held. It is ideal for no-budget film-making, and for use with smaller camcorders or DSLRs, in the absence of access to a dolly or Steadicam. The main idea is that camerawork can be smoother with your arm by your side, rather than extended, or flexed to low angles. The counterbalance makes it stable both vertically and horizontally, so SmitHIcam can be held level and steady on uneven surfaces.

image:image.image:title: Yeah- It's Better to Eat
image:image.image:caption:
I've been working with cats and ferals for decades now. Public awareness is increasing but these individuals would really benefit from further consideration and compassion, just as we do. This footage is from last year. The calico, Goldie, is still outdoors with a new family that my sister, mother, and I are working to bring in. Of the kittens in the video, I placed the orange and the black- Fireball & his sister, Stealth- with a compassionate neighbour just following Hallowe'en 2015. The grey & white was unfortunately run over and killed. I don't know what became of the others, though the neighbourhood was aware of them and I'm hoping they found homes. The black cat in the video, Sweety Pie, was brought in last fall, but I had to release her since upon examination I found she was nursing at the time. I managed to get her in again last week- this time, in time- she gave birth to four black kittens July 24. She and the little ones are safe and sound, now.
The commentary in the film was unscripted. I filmed Sweety Pie one night thru my living room window. My sister was quite ill at this time last year and in the background we hear her discussing a stomach ache (missed appendicitis at the hospital, which, very thankfully she's recovered from) and "trading one thing for another", along with whether it's better to eat or not. I chimed in, in keeping, I think with Sweety Pie's view, that "Yeah- it's better to eat." It was an interesting overlap, I think, and a microcosmic illustration of frame of reference.
Poverty, originating in human domination structures and spirit, extends oppression.
Update: we got Goldie in, along with 2 of her kittens from her Spring litter. She gave birth to a new litter of 4 females, including a calico :) one week after she came inside. All are safe and sound and will be warm for the winter, and ever after.
Experimental micro documentary. Film freeway profile: https://filmfreeway.com/project/847865

image:image.image:title: COOKIE
image:image.image:caption:
Starring: Rishipriya Basak , Sumedha Dey and Aishani Roy. Cookie (2016) | Short Film | Official Kolkata International Film Festival Selection.
Watch the trailer here - http://bit.ly/cookietrailer
Wendy and Tanushree share a sentiment more than friendship,which of course their landlady- a representative of the "reputed society" they live in, denies. Regular chaos is common & a Christmas day turns out bad for Wendy when her dog Cookie ends up injured. Horrified by a message in a fortune cookie that the waiter had handed her before, Wendy breaks down & her mask of self-sufficiency tears apart. She needs Tanu by her side but faces an un-anticipated decision, as Tanu ends their relationship. Further predicaments follow & Wendy suffers from hallucinations in a state of limbo, to the point of seeing herself falling from heights or dying unexplainibly. But "we are in a state of waking when we dream". Even though she is jarred out of her nightmares by a loving touch of Tanu, the promise of prevailing darkness remains & one might fear if the cycle will go on & on.
Cast: Rishipriya Basak , Sumedha Dey, Aishani Roy and Sunil Das. Story/Script/Dialogues: Aparna Das Director Of Photography: Aparna Das Music/Sound Design: Dip Chakraborty Acting Workshops Lead- Animikh Chakrabarty Costume Design - Ananya Banerjee Make Up - Shilpa Mondal Camera - Pushkar Sarkar VFX - Rittik Bhowmik Color Correction - Aparna Das , Rittik Bhowmik Color Grading - Rittik Bhowmik Edit: Rittik Bhowmik Direction: Aparna Das

image:image.image:title: Man Eating Plants
image:image.image:caption:
Nearly 8,000,000 people die of starvation each year when most are walking distance from wild edible plants! Over 20,000 species of edible plants exist in the world, yet only 20 species provide 90% of our plant-based foods. In Los Angeles alone, over 2,000 species of wild edible plants exist, yet most people here could not name one of them. We're going to change this in a fun, exciting way!
MEP Trailer: http://youtu.be/eNMrjmkCAZA

image:image.image:title: Hiral...Spreading Lustre
image:image.image:caption: Hiral...Spreading Lustre" is a true story of 10 years old girl, born with Down syndrome. Despite, her disability the girl has so much love and positive energy to give. She has touched many lives by just giving her selfless love, & brightened lives of people around her. Once, she visited an old age home with her mother, and surprisingly loved to spend time with the lonely elderly. Hiral loves to talk, hug and at the receiving end are people who are craving for the same, someone to sit with them, spend time and give them happiness & they see their grand children in her. Now these visits have become a regular feature for Hiral. Hiral has proved that people with special needs are not only at the receiving end, Here Hiral is the one giving support and love to the generation which has been "Forgotten...Bygone...but not gone yet…"

image:image.image:title: Sonia's Story
image:image.image:caption: The short movie is set in Florence in the '70s. It opens with a tribute to the Sergio Leone’s movie “The good, the bad and the ugly”. All children who were born in Italy in the ’60 knew about this film. The Director’s quote from the famous “Triel” is the stylistic device to introduce the story of Sonia from age 11 to adulthood. The spectator gets in touch with the feelings of an entire generation through Sonia's life. That historical and political period in Italy is marked by terrorism and the movie describes the generational conflict of people at that time. Following utopian ideals, some Italian young people renounced their backgrounds and behaved violently. In the film, this behaviour is evoked as Sonia's emotional journey. Due to her actions, she lived a long period of detention, during which time she constructively reviewed her past. Sonia's life is marked by her love for art and beauty, so the Roman amphitheatre in Fiesole where she used to play as a child, welcomes her, at the end of her personal renaissance, finally free.

image:image.image:title: Grampy
image:image.image:caption:
A documentary filmmaker follows her grandfather to Liverpool as he re-discovers his tragic post-war childhood. Grampy finally reveals secrets kept since childhood - a series of unfortunate events peppered with all kinds of abuse and neglect. 'A lot of people have no idea what goes on behind closed doors... I just felt, at my time of life, the time had come to say something about it. Weather its important to anyone or not... I don't know. But those who are interested will know...what happened.' 'Grampy' depicts a fight for normality which seems other-worldly, yet starkly relate-able by many even today.
Grampy, (Eric Galvani) was evacuated from Liverpool at the age of 5 during WW2. Having already lost his mother, he was taken from the rest of his family and moved around the countryside. However, the worst was yet to come. A poverty-stricken post war Liverpool was waiting for him at the end of the war, and so were his bitter stepmother and volatile father. The youngest of 8 children, Eric faced a hungry childhood which might take his whole life to come to terms with. 'The adults who were supposed to act in my interest... I would say to them, Look at me and speak to me, as if I'm a fellow human being...not turn your back and ignore me as you might do a dog that's running round on the floor.'
image:image.image:geo_location: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

image:image.image:title: The Monkey With Harmonica
image:image.image:caption:
A runaway monkey plays harmonica and kills a house painter in the circus.
Genre: Thriller, mystery, drama
Klement (45), a worker, is perched onto a 5-meter scaffold. He’s very tired and from time to time falls asleep. While he’s painting the walls, a runaway circus Monkey playing harmonica blues enters. Klement nervously calls the Monkey with a bad name, threatening to take its freedom away. The Monkey comes under the scaffold and pushes it. Klement falls down and is taken by The Doctor (55) and the Driver Z (40) to a hospital while the monkey disappears. On the way to the hospital, Driver Z drives the ambulance with the siren beeping. Driver Z ignores a mandatory turn signal from a Traffic officer standing in the middle of the crossroad and continues driving down the empty boulevard. Two luxury cars with the engines turned on are parked side by side on the road. The Director and Driver X are speaking indistinctly through the windows. The ambulance stops for a moment with Driver Z observing the two cars on the street blocking it. After a while, he drives the ambulance in reverse, sets parking brake, then puts the vehicle in the first gear and accelerates, warning the two drivers with a loud revving before heading rapidly down the middle of the road. At the last moment, the two luxury vehicles move to the pavement letting the high-speed ambulance to pass exactly between. On the inside of the ambulance, the Doctor holding a stethoscope on the chest of Klement announces his death. In the circus The Sweeper cleans the blood pool with a broom. The Director enters the circus and nervously asks for Klement before sighing unhappily and going to his office. Hearing the phone ringing from the inside, he enters and starts talking to an unidentifiable person, narrating the incident with the ambulance car. Suddenly, The Director’s conversation is interrupted by a harmonica blues. The Monkey plays the harmonica slowly walking through the hall all the way to the office. The Director gets off from the phone. The Monkey walks to the door of the office and stops playing. It dismantles the harmonica and gets a knife from it, lowering it. The Director moves his hand towards the lock, getting ready to open the door.

image:image.image:title: Lilith The Vampire
image:image.image:caption: In 1484, in Germany, after travel to the Carpathian Mountains, in Church’s default of appearance, a Knight of the Order of the Cross saves a woman, a prisoner accused of witchcraft, taking her as his wife. Twelve years later, the knight’s wife discovers a secret book and makes a spellcasting invoking Lilith. Lilith invades the knight’s hut; Lilith kills the knight and transforms the woman on Vampire. Lilith and the woman become lovers. They cross six centuries and several continents, liberating and transforming other women in vampires. Finally in 2016 in New York City, they fight a battle with the descendants of the Order of the Cross’ Knights.

image:image.image:title: RECLAIM
image:image.image:caption: For a world with a finite number of resources, communities today are faced with a global crisis in terms of how we spend our resources and how we choose to reduce our waste. How can we reduce our raw trash output? How can we make use of our recycling patterns, and amplify its effects in order to save our planet? In the city of Grand Rapids, Michigan, a creative reuse center has helped pioneer a local movement in recycling and artistic reuse. Tapping into art’s therapeutic elements as a means of community and social change, these artists have begun a journey towards global resource reuse.

image:image.image:title: From Flint: Voices of a Poisoned City
image:image.image:caption: From Flint: Voices From A Poisoned City is a documentary that tells the story of the Flint Water Crisis from the perspectives of those who have experienced this tragedy first hand and from activists on the ground working through grass-root organizations to make a difference. While the national news media has been covering this event through the governmental point of view, From Flint takes you inside the city to uncover this incident first hand.

image:image.image:title: Who lives my life?
image:image.image:caption: A new journey begins.

image:image.image:title: Searching For Abbas KIARSTAMI
image:image.image:caption: A Syrian man carries a large photo of the Iranian director Abbas Kiarestami and wanders in the streets of Paris to ask the passers-by the address of him. He wants him to talk about the Syrian revolution to his government. He heads to the Iranian embassy, subways and coffee shops but gets no answer.

image:image.image:title: Cherry Days
image:image.image:caption: In a small town in Aleppo’s suburbs, bombings never stopped for more than two years. During the very hot summer of July 2014, the most followed sports event in the world took place: the FIFA world cup. The city is in ruins, women and children all left long ago, and a group of young men still tries to live day after day. This documentary shows the everyday life of the young Syrians today, and listens to what they have to say. Sports, poetry, dance and dreams are everywhere alongside bombings, tears and weapons. Discussing soccer and politics, criticizing the regime and the jihadis alike, these young people are surprising by how vulnerable and humant they are. They show a complex reality of a still hopeful youth, beyond the morbid images of the bloodiest war of our century.

image:image.image:title: Kung Fool
image:image.image:caption:
Kung Fool is a bizarre action short which which explores whether the pen is mightier than the sword when a Kung Fu teacher faces off against one of his students who may just be getting the better of him.
Whilst the film is profound in its own ways, Kung Fool was meant to be an opportunity to pen an open letter to young film makers: in that this film was produced entirely on an iPhone 6s with no camera attachments, no external microphones and certainly no skilled cast whatsoever. Everything you see was borrowed from a friend and everyone you'll see is one of my friends. The reason I'm highlighting these facts is because I wanted to make a point in that you don't need thousands of dollars of budget to create something special. All you need is passion and let your vision drive the rest.
I'll let you all decide if we succeeded at that.

image:image.image:title: LIFECREDIT
image:image.image:caption:
In a bankrupt future, people get genetic chip implants that extend LIFE, which they trade for instant credit. This dangerous system leads a conspiracy theorist to expose a plot, that unexpectedly traces back to the Roswell crash.
Pitch: "Enemy of the State" meets "The X-Files"

image:image.image:title: Scopolamine
image:image.image:caption: Scopolamine takes us through the story of a Colombian girl named Daniela, who now lives in London. She experienced a traumatic childhood with her mother being shot in the Colombian civil war and her father sexually abusing her. Fast forward to the present, she's 24 and settled in London perfectly; with a fancy apartment in Central London. She doesn't work as such, but she gets her money taking advantage of preying men using Scopolamine under the codename Daniela De'Ville Under the influence of Scopolamine, the subject becomes completely devoid of their free will and will obey any command from anyone. Throughout the story, we see how Daniela utilises this drug against males who are non the wiser to her real agenda... until she meets an established drug dealer called Nathan. A rising attraction is quickly struck up between the two, but Daniela is a heartless woman, with no love for men. And their brief relationship ends the same as every other one of her flings with male counter-parts... A paycheque for Daniela and a blank memory for her victim. But Nathan and his protege, Billy take money very seriously and, in turn, go to seek and find the conniving young woman. Daniela Lusero has rebuilt her life after a traumatic childhood in her hometown, Colombia. Her new life in London consists of posing under the codename Daniela De'ville in the streets of Soho, luring men in with her beauty then drugging them with Scopolamine. A dangerous, mind-controlling drug.
image:image.image:geo_location: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

According to scholars , sleep paralysis happens during the stage of sleep known as rapid eye movement ( REM acronym in English). In this situation, the person wakes up and sees a menacing figure in your room or have the feeling that your chest is being pressed.

image:image.image:title: Among Cavaco, Horse and Gate
image:image.image:caption: Michel is a musician who loves his 'cavaquinho', a Brazilian instrument. His best friend is a horse. Silvania lives in the same neighborhood where Michel does, in the city of Sao Paulo. She faces difficulties in getting out of home. Silvania thinks that the only person who understands her is a friend, Milagre, who is Michel's mother. By the other hand, his style of life bothers Milagre. Michel and Silvania are diagnosed with psychiatric disorders and have already been called crazy. But what craziness is?

image:image.image:title: door and shop
image:image.image:caption: A conductor challenged, a spry octogenarian host of a television program that spares no one, friends from home watching it on TV, up to an unpredictable ending. The protagonist is Lapo Corsini, played by the same Salvini, a spry octogenarian, Florentine DOC, old-fashioned. Disaffected from television broadcasts and debates on sport, religion and politics, decides to write the program "Uscio e Bottega" asking to be invited because he, a man of the people, would like to ask questions very specific to the various guests. The direction of Rai invites him on the TV show. The film follows the journey of so Lapo Corsini, with friend Mancuso, to Rome, also through an insert set in the town of Montefiascone. On the evening of the broadcast will be followed with trepidation by friends and relatives of Lapo, along with some young people with disabilities, in front of the giant screen mounted in the gardens of the circle in front of the Ponte Vecchio in Florence. During transmission Lapo Corsini you will never lose heart, all vigorously attacking and criticizing without hesitation. The audience, hotly, follow the contest, applauding Lapo until the moment when, during a break in television, Lapo disappear mysteriously. Reached the ears of the Pope to the existence of a character which Lapo Corsini, the Pope will invite him to a private interview surprising outcome.

image:image.image:title: EBBBO
image:image.image:caption:
Ebbbo es una interpretación sobre el ciclo de vida y la subsistencia orgánica. Es una mirada íntima que nos posiciona en el lugar de un ser frágil y efímero como la vida misma.
Ebbbo is an interpretation about the life cycle and organic subsistence. It is an intimate look that positions us in the place of a fragile and ephemeral being like life itself.

image:image.image:title: A sweet heart inside a cappuccino
image:image.image:caption:
A homeless man walks into a bar and after having left his two large bags on the floor, he timidly asks for a coffee, while a beautiful and elegant lady is sitting in front of a heart-shaped foam cappuccino. The bartender does not pay attention to the request of the homeless man, until he painfully throws a handful of small coins on the bar counter. The barman, quite bothered, collects them, prepares the coffee and winks sweet smiles to the lady. He goes on acidly talking about the homeless man. The lady looks at him with complicity, but then, something unexpected happens ...
The homeless man represents in a broad sense all the marginalized, but he could even be the person who sleeps under the bridge, but also a family man who has lost his job or his house or whatever. Anyway, that shows the condition of most of the people who are now living "marginalized" by society for various reasons.

image:image.image:title: FOR A BETTER DREAM
image:image.image:caption: Michael, an ambitious salesman has recently been fired. Unable to come to terms with his new found reality, Michael finds himself on an unfamiliar and dangerous path. His wife Emily must go down memory lane to remind him of a simpler time. Michael represents the exhausted and obsessive nature of corporate jobs and the film symbolizes the need to take a moment to ourselves, and think about a better dream.

image:image.image:title: KIDS OF CARNAVAL
image:image.image:caption: Kids of Carnaval is an original theme, speaking of art and lives of children involved in this manifestation known and admired worldwide. Brings unique images of great plastic beauty, and a playful approach that should be of interest to the public worldwide. The film is told only by the images and testimonies of these children, and can show the importance of these little artists in the continuity of Carnival. The film won the JURY AWARD in International Open film Festival (Bangladesh), semifinalist in Ohrid Film Festival (Macedonian), and and was chosen in the official selection of the Los Angeles Cine Fest, New York city Online Film Screenings, Toronto Film Week, TrueDoc Documentary Festival and now in Indiwise

image:image.image:title: Orbs: They Are Among Us
image:image.image:caption: May 11th, 1977, NASA launched their last Apollo Mission, Apollo 21. What was discovered has never been publicly acknowledged and is believed to be one of the biggest Government cover-ups in history. Did the men on this mission experience an Alien encounter? Now 37 years later, Wilbur, one of the former astronauts who led Apollo 21, is haunted by the memories of what he witnessed and lives a booze-riddled, debauched life with his young wife, Loraine. As he begins to question what really happened on the mission, strange occurrences begin to surround them as mysterious Orbs pass by unnoticed. Slowly they begin to unravel, slipping into insanity. Is it the work of Aliens? A black military operation, or is something far more sinister playing with their minds?

image:image.image:title: Battletown Witch
image:image.image:caption: Band - Order 59 Produced - E&L Productions Director - Edward B. Franke Actors: Nichole Doimer - Leah Smock Sharron Stockin - Witch Zoe Sondergeld - Child Victim Leiana Roach - Redhead Victim Loretta Young - Dark hair Victim Caia England - Young Girl A Very Special Thanks: Michael Sondergeld Wayne Denner

image:image.image:title: Reboots show 3
image:image.image:caption: Imagination

image:image.image:title: I Camminatori. Resoconto audiovisivo per isole erranti
image:image.image:caption: Halfway between imaginative dimension and sound, between documentary and time-lapse, frames and sounds that inhabit the pictures of "I camminatori" (The walkers) bring into resonance the words of Testa's poems, framing each verse in a kind of instant sound. Conceived as a musical score, the film-installation is characterized by the double dialectic between sound and image: from one hand, the audio text alternates readings to actual soundtracks acousmatic poem, the image, from the other hand the visual part is played on the contrast between static and plasticity; slow movements of the machine that linger on landscapes where there is an absence of man, alternate with sequences in time-lapse and characterized by a frenetic pace and tight. A collage of stories and improvisations sequence where image and sound come together in a poietic and abstract dimension, while the rhythm, punctuated by the alternation of film shot and time-lapse, characterizes the formal symmetry. One possible reading of an archetype as widespread as mythological: the journey, the journey undertaken by hikers, explorers, the dreamers, the emigrants, to all those that move like real islands wandering between water and land borders in the world , A trip, then, driven by the desire to explore the world that lies beyond the veil of everyday life behind and which are gathered and amplified anxieties, instincts and psychology that belongs to the man of every time and every place.

image:image.image:title: Subliminal
image:image.image:caption: A young and previously unknown company chooses a small town to sell a revolutionary new product. Adrian and Cristian, after his morning workout, talk about this technology and looking for ways to get it.

image:image.image:title: THE ANDROID WHO LIVED TWICE
image:image.image:caption: The fate of humankind is in the hands of an android. The short story is not essentially "about" robots; it is about the human condition and what it means to be human. In a future dominated by Replicants, a female Android hostes a man on the lam, instead of denouncing him to the frontier authorities. When she learns that the man worked on her construction, she takes care of him and defends him against Replicants. But the war between men and androids will overwhelm their lives changing the fate of the earth.

image:image.image:title: Hofuku (Revenge)
image:image.image:caption: "Hofuku" (Revenge in English) is a short science fiction with touches of horror / suspense based on historical facts and Japanese legends. In this short real image is mixed with animation and even credits have a surprises.

image:image.image:title: POWER UP
image:image.image:caption: An Astronaut name Bright, living in the enormous cold space all by himself alone seeking an energy source for a living. After traveling a few light years away from earth, he made it to a living star with a golden light source that generates energy & electricity, Bright attempts to plug his ship into the star and absorb the energy into the ship that help generate many ship supplies for his living, turns out that Bright wasn’t bright enough to limit the use of the living star’s bright energy, and so as the living star must stop Bright from wasting his light too before his spirits vanish.

image:image.image:title: Above the Fold
image:image.image:caption:
PASSWORD: montag
A journalist working for a tabloid paper poses a threat to a newly created political party. When the head of the party is confronted by the journalist, he puts a call out to silence him once and for all.
image:image.image:geo_location: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

image:image.image:title: Ghebbar Woods 2016 Trailer
image:image.image:caption:
What lengths would you go to in order to become famous? Three childhood friends head out for a weekend in the woods to film their own survival show with the hopes of becoming internet famous. However, things start to go awry when something crash lands near their campsite.
Check out the two official trailers below:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pmTx5b6x4Lc&t=3s
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LhBcmk1HCtg
Check us out on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/ghebbarwoods/
Visit the official film website:
https://www.ghebbarwoods.com

image:image.image:title: Fixated
image:image.image:caption:
Fixated explores the interaction between camera and subject, and the perception of sexuality and sensuality, through the eyes of the unconscious mind.
Developed from the inquisitive imagination of Bonnie Curtis. Wanting to explore the stereotypical views of female sexuality and sensuality, Bonnie has brought to life a distorted image of feminine sexuality. Inspired by the imagery of iconic surrealist Salvador Dali and Sigmund Freud’s theories of the unconscious mind.

image:image.image:title: Between walls
image:image.image:caption:
Between walls (Mellem væggene) is a cgi short film with elements of 2d animation.
An uninspired writer is trying to write a poem, but he is stuck between the walls of his home. All the negative energy around him materializes in black crows, which only his young daughter Mille seems to be able to see. Mille is innocent and open-minded and trying to discover her own creativity, and soon creates a little white bird, which fills her with joy. But her father subconsciously projects his frustrations onto her, as he does not know the effect he has on his own surroundings.

image:image.image:title: VIEW AFTER YOU
image:image.image:caption: If 2 mints of Blackout makes us so much uncomfortable, can we think of lifetime Blackout? PLEASE DONATE YOUR EYES

image:image.image:title: DEATH DEAL
image:image.image:caption: A young girl take a rental flat for writing a story. One night when she is working some horror incident happened with her, and she finally track in that situation…………..

image:image.image:title: fan
image:image.image:caption: The rural old woman's tv antenna has ruined,after some hours the national soccer will begin. The old woman is hardly trying to repair it but she can not succeed .moreover there isn't any man in the village to help her so she travells to a city ...

image:image.image:title: Rumours
image:image.image:caption:
We only ever see fragments of each other's lives, even the people we think we know well. In fact when it comes to our friends, our colleagues, our loved ones, we assume we know everything about them and make decisions, judgements based on these facts but life is unpredictable and the extraordinary is more regular than we think. Rumours is set on a day which should have been like any other: instead two colleagues share a moment that will shake their worlds forever.
I wrote this short film because I sincerely believe that no matter how busy, how stressful our lives are we should all be kinder to each other.
The aim is to make this script into an animation.
image:image.image:geo_location: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

image:image.image:title: NIMBU PANI
image:image.image:caption: A lonely boy thirsting for lemonade and not having a penny to his home. Try to convince a couple drinking lemonade at the stall. On being dishearted the boy leave's the stall. Determined to get enough money to have that glass of lemonade. The boy start to think of idea to earn some money. What are the problems that come to his way? The idea that he uses to collect money for glass of lemonade. Find at the end do he get the drink the glass of lemonade......

image:image.image:title: The Corpse Is Alive
image:image.image:caption: A man gets buried alive, with a cell phone, a gun and a single bullet.

image:image.image:title: Shadow of a Shadow- Screenplay
image:image.image:caption: Shadow of a Shadow- Winner-Nice/Montreal and Los Angeles film festivals
image:image.image:geo_location: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

image:image.image:title: Natak
image:image.image:caption:
This Doc-Short film tries to cover the Natak which is arranged by Jamdudhai gaushala mandal, every year at Dusshera (Indian festival), at Jamdudhai Village in Jamnagar, Gujarat. We have tried to cover an act of drama also known as Bhavai, which is the traditional form of gujarati theater.
This Natak takes place with a motive of helping cows, birds and other domestic animals to get sufficient fodder even during the times of droughts or other natural calamities. Animals are also fed with green grass at every festival. This tradition was introduced by Maharaj Gopladas in 1941.

image:image.image:title: The Hero That Here Lies
image:image.image:caption: Alyssa (Camryn Handler) and her father (Kevin Siegelbaum) are inseparable. They share a love of theatre, especially Shakespeare. Having recently revealed a family secret to her, Alyssa now faces the brunt of school bullying and humiliation, the very thing he was hoping to avoid. Being a Junior in high school, she has enough stress without having to contend with Carl (Meddrick Mazile) and his nonsense. Flanked by her two best friends, Dee (Deanna Quintero) and Laurel (Jenny Friedman), Alyssa will need all the support she can get if she is going to survive Carl's attempts at humiliation and a family tragedy.

image:image.image:title: Por No
image:image.image:caption: 'Por no' is an experimental short film that strives to problematize sexual miscommunication, which derives from the universal topic of sex, being treated as something that needs to be spoken about eloquently, because when one doesn't speak about doubts, concerns, propositions, suggestions, ideas, fantasies and desires... It simply creates a taboo which will continue to grow, stemming from sexism and ignorance. 'Por no' is an aesthetic and conceptual experience, supported by aspects from Postporn and NeoCamp philosophies, and attempts to incite to a more creative (auto)exploration, and to better orgasms.

image:image.image:title: ENSNARED
image:image.image:caption: When Viki learns that her lawsuit has stalled, she makes her next move... Official Selection - Stage One Film Festival 2015 WINNER - ACS Encouragement Award for Cinematography in a One-Shot Film; Stage One Film Festival 2015 Finalist - Best Film; Stage One Film Festival 2015 Official Selection - Below Five Zero Film Festival 2016 Official Selection - Understory Film Festival 2015 Finalist - Best Film; Understory Film Festival 2015 1st Runner Up - Worldwide Short Film Competition 2015 Official Selection - LA CINEFEST 2015 Official Selection - Blackbird Film Festival 2015 Nominee Best short Film, Best Actress - Sara Schlagenhauff, Best Director - Justin Hartwell ASIN AWARDS 2015

image:image.image:title: BEWARE
image:image.image:caption: Beware is a Short Film that has a hidden Satire.Kindly give your Reviews and comments, Cant go in more details as you have to watch it to know more.

image:image.image:title: BROKEN
image:image.image:caption: Max is a man broken by severe depression, but a chance meeting may give him the motivation to make a positive change in his life. WINNER - Best Short Film / Highest Achievement - Cinematography / Highest Achievement - Screenplay ASIN AWARDS 2015 Official Selection - Stage One Film Festival 2015 Official Selection - Understory Film Festival 2015 Official Selection - Malta Mental Health Film Festival 2015 Official Selection - Blackbird Film Festival 2015 Official Selection - LA CINEFEST 2016

image:image.image:title: Carty: A Lifecycle
image:image.image:caption: The life and career of Toronto-based photographer, Steve Carty, from his discovery of the art form in high school to his flourishing career as a fashion, portrait and most recently, cycling photographer.

image:image.image:title: MICHELLE CULLEN: PRINTMAKER & PAINTER
image:image.image:caption: Discover a vibrant and colourful fantasy world by Gold Coast artist Michelle Cullen, from detailed etches to vast landscape canvases.

image:image.image:title: 336 killa
image:image.image:caption: CONVICTED MASS KILLA ON A KILLING SPREE.

image:image.image:title: The One Time Thing
image:image.image:caption: A good Samaritan has a one-time fling with an eccentric young woman. But when her volatile boxer boyfriend comes home unexpectedly from training they have to cover their tracks and avoid a violent confrontation.

image:image.image:title: Shakkhi (The Witness)
image:image.image:caption:
In Bengali "Sakkhi" means the witness. This short film depicts the story of a girl, Tania being raped, from a unique perspective. It narrates a tale of a gang rape victim, struggling through her life even after four months from the incident.
This work of fiction deals with the changing perspectives of known and unknown people towards the girl, swinging emotions and special bonding between her and her elder sister Adrita. Though a forgotten case for majority of the society, after four months , the struggle of Tania remains within. It's for this struggle, Tania at one moment decides to go public with her incident, in another she keeps on rubbing her face to wipe out the imaginary marks, permanently inscribed on her soul.

image:image.image:title: Black Masque
image:image.image:caption: A father battles to protect his family when a plague breaks out. The only thing in his way is a enigmatic rich man, who is also trying to protect his own daughter.

image:image.image:title: Family Picture
image:image.image:caption: It is a short film about a boy who never know his mother's face and his journey towards his dreams.

image:image.image:title: Siren
image:image.image:caption: A young man lost in the woods finds a beautiful and magical creature.

image:image.image:title: Im in Love with High Heels
image:image.image:caption: What if you were in love with high heels and someone destroyed your favorite pair. Find out in I'm in Love with High Heels.

image:image.image:title: A Single Photograph
image:image.image:caption: This film shows how photographs arent just someone clicking a shutter button.

image:image.image:title: The Road Home
image:image.image:caption: Needing to clear his mind and get away, a man goes on a drive to nowhere and is haunted by memories of a woman he loved.

image:image.image:title: Mans Best Friend
image:image.image:caption: Jack is a 12 year old boy and his dog has just died. When his dad gives him a little toy dog from his childhood the dog comes to life and jack makes a new best friend.

image:image.image:title: Larry
image:image.image:caption: A story about loneliness in a big city. A women finds only one thing to love in her apartment, her steamer.

image:image.image:title: Stammer
image:image.image:caption: A boy, in high school, has to overcome his stammer during a presentation. A bully in the class keeps picking on him and humiliates him in front of the class.

image:image.image:title: A CupSong
image:image.image:caption: A teenager sings to the first love of her life in a big empty house. She is about to leave forever and explore the possibilities and beauty of the world. In the song she invites her first boyfriend to join her. nothing will stop her from departing...

image:image.image:title: Deville - "What Remains" (OFFICIAL MUSIC VIDEO)
image:image.image:caption: This video was inspired by the classic "Thelma & Louise", where two friends decide to leave their old controlled lives behind in search of something better and more true. I think all people can relate to that feeling, It's just that very few of us really make those desires into reality. As always, I shot the video without the band having a clue what it was about until they saw it for the first time.

image:image.image:title: It Was Dali
image:image.image:caption: It Was Dali tells the story of a bright woman dominated by her husband, a successful software entrepreneur in the Bay Area. On Valentine’s day, they go out to have dinner. Suddenly, they wake up alone in a huge empty house. They don’t know how they got there, and they don’t know the house nor the neighborhood. As they try to figure out what happened to them, their relationship problems emerge under the pressure of the unknown, until they finally are able to express how they feel in relation to each other.

image:image.image:title: WORK
image:image.image:caption: The firing of a diffident middle aged bank teller and his wife's subsequent injury during a drug related robbery trigger a series of upheavals in the lives of several seemingly unconnected people.

image:image.image:title: A Bottle Of Milk
image:image.image:caption: "Kianoosh" is a twenty seven years old author who has thoughts of committing suicide by taking some drug pills, so after a while he puts in motion his plan; while he is awaiting his death, he realizes that he has forgot to write his testament; for it is important for him to express his will, he feels regretful and he decides to live, meanwhile "Azriel" knocks his door ...

image:image.image:title: A Bottle Of Milk
image:image.image:caption: "Kianoosh" is a twenty seven years old author who has thoughts of committing suicide by taking some drug pills, so after a while he puts in motion his plan; while he is awaiting his death, he realizes that he has forgot to write his testament; for it is important for him to express his will, he feels regretful and he decides to live, meanwhile "Azriel" knocks his door ...

image:image.image:title: A Bottle Of Milk
image:image.image:caption: "Kianoosh" is a twenty seven years old author who has thoughts of committing suicide by taking some drug pills, so after a while he puts in motion his plan; while he is awaiting his death, he realizes that he has forgot to write his testament; for it is important for him to express his will, he feels regretful and he decides to live, meanwhile "Azriel" knocks his door ...

image:image.image:title: Star Wars: Emergence
image:image.image:caption: Alenna, a Jedi Padawan, is blinded in an ambush designed to leave her dead. Facing inner demons and dangerous foes, she must rediscover her purpose and identity as a Jedi Knight.

image:image.image:title: 36 Hours
image:image.image:caption: This film was written, directed, and starring me, Josh Hayslett, a bartlett high school student in Bartlett, TN. This was my first short film and I anticipate to create many more and is open to collaborate with any aspiring or established writers, actors,producers, and directors. This film is about a young artist who makes the biggest of their life.

image:image.image:title: Life On Water
image:image.image:caption: Summary of this film: This documentary is about a Catholic priest ‘Father John’ who lives on a houseboat in canal. While he could live in a house he decided to live on a houseboat, which we call it ‘Life on Water’.
image:image.image:geo_location: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

image:image.image:title: Living in Suburbia
image:image.image:caption: In a seemingly quiet suburb, mysterious occurrences begin to happen between two couples as relationships are tested and bonds are broken leading to deadly consequences.

image:image.image:title: Fateful Cycles
image:image.image:caption: Evelyn and Abe are soulmates that have just graduated from High School. Due either to naivety or an advanced understanding of their reality, they decide they're ready to have a child. This short revolves around the repercussions of this decision as well as the the connection between individual rights, community expectations, and communication.

image:image.image:title: Awakening
image:image.image:caption: A woman finds herself stuck in an endless cycle of a fragile mental health state. PASSWORD: despertar123

image:image.image:title: American Addiction
image:image.image:caption: American Addiction tells the story of Edwin Galloway, a young man addicted to prescription medication. Edwin struggles with the realism of an addiction while also trying to mend the relationship with his distant mother. Will Edwin overcome the life of an addict? Can he redeem himself and build the relationship that he has lost?

image:image.image:title: Captain Zid
image:image.image:caption: Zid decided to build a Pirate Ship to his escape from an island, but he didn’t think of a way to put the ship into the sea after finishing its construction. And now? How can he reach the sea?

image:image.image:title: Juan and the cloud
image:image.image:caption: Juan is a child who doesn’t have any friends. La Nube is a cloud who doesn’t have any cloud friends. They find each other and become friends. However, Juan grows up and gets lost in the grey adult world.

image:image.image:title: Inside A Bundle
image:image.image:caption: Lost in a city, an old woman with dementia hopefully searches for her long lost daughter to assure her of her mother's love and desire to care for her.

image:image.image:title: Helsinki
image:image.image:caption: Waiting for closing time, Carmen and Lola are watching a science-fiction movie in the pub where they work. Lola, the most naïve of the two, fantasizes about how to meet a time traveller and a great idea comes up: they should write a letter to a time traveller! Right now! A while later, the pub door opens and… Will Lola and Carmen discover their future? En attendant la fin de sa journée au bar où elles travaillent, Carmen et Lola passent son temps à regarder un film de science-fiction. Lola, la plus rêveuse des deux, commence à imaginer comment il serait de connaître un voyageur du temps. Comment savoir? Très facile: Il ne faut qu’écrire une lettre pour avoir un rendez-vous avec lui dans… seulement quelques minutes! A une heure du matin, la porte du bar s’ouvre et...Lola et Carmen, découvriront-elles leur avenir?

image:image.image:title: Detention
image:image.image:caption: Aula de castigo (Detention) is a spanish horror web series.

image:image.image:title: BAUHAUS WINDOWS
image:image.image:caption: Recycling materials with historic meaning are being put together by apprentices and professionals to erect a temporary event pavilion in front of the Bauhaus Archiv in Berlin. The determining architectural elements of the pavilion are about 100 meters of re-used steel windows from the Bauhaus building in Dessau. The process is in a its aspects a declaration of love for the ideas of the Bauhaus.

image:image.image:title: Touché
image:image.image:caption: A Princess decides to fight off her new evil stepmother, but instead as they fight she realizes that stepmothers might not be that bad. - - - A film made over the course of seven months at the College for Creative Studies. This is made as a dedication to good stepmothers, wherever they may be. Thank you to everyone who helped make this possible

image:image.image:title: Choice
image:image.image:caption: Eve feels alone, but she isn't. A life grows inside her, though she does not want it to, just like she didn't want him to.. Feeling like she her life has been turned upside down, Eve struggles with the psychological effects of her situation.

image:image.image:title: Flutulus
image:image.image:caption: A couple of family retires in a house in the woods for few days in the way to decide on the birth of their child. The husband wants a career, his wife wishes to preserve the life growing in her. "To be or not to be?" "Everything is in your hands" is the answer to the question. The story is seen through the eyes of the child, now already an old woman.

image:image.image:title: Help
image:image.image:caption: A man needs help but people around him just take pictures and record the event... This is a short animation about bad habbits in modern societies Directed by iranian director Mahnaz YAzdani.

image:image.image:caption: Here is a Micro film simulating an unknown distress call from an unknown origin, with an unexpected ending

image:image.image:title: STRATEGO
image:image.image:caption: My screenplay is an Action Thriller about A Teenager's struggle to save his adoptive family from a crime organization in the streets of Richmond, California.

image:image.image:title: Our Saving Grace
image:image.image:caption: Three immature college students, Jack, Danny, and Rashad, attempt to restore order to a world that has descended into mayhem.

image:image.image:title: IGNORANCE
image:image.image:caption: Rajesh and Radha are carrying out their daily morning activities. Something very disturbing starts happening next door and it is about to ruin the routine atmosphere of the couple. Radha loses her patience and demands some reaction from her husband. Rajesh does what he thinks is right. Find out what it was !

image:image.image:title: ISO
image:image.image:caption: Leon is a well respected photographer by his teacher and classmates. Sky, one of his classmates, seems to be interested in him.

image:image.image:title: Beautify.TV MUA on-set | Music Video "Oh Mindy" | Episode 4
image:image.image:caption: Go back to 1989 and behind-the-scenes on a music video set! The band is Aaron Williams Band and the song is "Oh Mindy," written for the feature comedy, "Mindy Over Mindy." Watch as pro MUA Linda Camacho sets out to re-create the character of "Mindy" from the film.

image:image.image:title: oblivion
image:image.image:caption: two strangers meets in a place, and spontaneus relashionship between they will become in the torture of one of the protagonists.

image:image.image:title: Twincarnation
image:image.image:caption:
Sisters Erika & Elysia Aksos (Jessica Felice in a dual role) were notorious murderers in the 1920's & 30's with over 400 victims falling to their deaths ... when they were sentenced, the sisters said that they will be back.
Almost 75 years later, Ron & Melanie (Jason Klingensmith & Melissa Heflin) purchase the Aksos's old house without knowing the history of the Aksos sisters. The Aksos sisters now see their opportunity to come back - to be reborn... and they are as Ron & Melanie's twin girls - and pick right back up where they left off with the bloodshed.
When the girls (Alexis Arnold & Sailor Holland) turn 8 (again), all hell breaks loose! A little slip of the tongue from an old woman (Victoria Mullen) implants the Aksos name into Melanie's head, the story told to her by the Aksos cousin Krystof (Michael Sciabarassi) and with the help of her own mother (Lynn Lowry), Melanie tries to figure out if the Aksos twins have in fact been reborn as her daughters.

image:image.image:title: Beautify.TV | Model of the Year Emily Lopez | Episode 2
image:image.image:caption:
Everyone loves a good fashion photo shoot! Watch as actress/model Emily Lopez performs at her first photo shoot as Beautify's MODEL OF THE YEAR.
Beautify.TV attempts a fresh take on the make-up and fashion tutorial videos. Beautify.TV was created by producer/director Ashley Dallman and professional Make-up Artists and Salon Owner, Linda Camacho. They set out to create a series of videos that are entertaining, informative, and fun that cover a variety of topics of make-up, skin care, film, fashion, and art. (EPISODE 1-4 available) More coming 2017!

image:image.image:title: Don't Breathe Past the Cemetery
image:image.image:caption: When a liberal southern belle travels North for a Washington internship with her Confederate loving brother and rebel rousing ex-boyfriend they stumble onto a sacred Civil War burial ground that revisits not only brother verse brother, but zombie verse zombie.

image:image.image:title: CODENAME:DASHER
image:image.image:caption: Follow Dasher (Hitman) as he goes on a mission to retrieve a classified object from highly skilled and dangerous villains.

image:image.image:title: KADOOGE! My Shell [Official Music Video]
image:image.image:caption: Kadooge! is a four piece heavy rock band based out of Aurora, IL. They've come together by creating powerful and fulfilling music that isn't safe or predictable. Their first album, "Nothing is Almost Everything" is a perfect example of great rock music with an experimental edge. The first single, My Shell, is not for the faint of heart (or beating heart rather.) The music video features the members of the band: Aerie Dover, Tony Montana, Pat Goode, and Quentin Dove braving the darkness. After breaking out of their "shells" they travel through a monochrome landscape of picture frames turned portals to another dimension, as they work their way through an existential crisis.

image:image.image:title: Shepherd
image:image.image:caption: After his livestock are slaughtered overnight, a rancher goes head to head with a deadly beast.

image:image.image:title: SEAHORSE COVE
image:image.image:caption: The daughter of an ocean researcher befriends a life size seahorse who has emerged from another world under the sea.

image:image.image:title: SHADOW WOLVES
image:image.image:caption: A Border Patrol guard is warned by a drug lord of an impending terrorist plot which the President of the United States is coordinating.

image:image.image:title: Beyond The Surface - Love is Louder
image:image.image:caption: This is a story that represents all of us. It shows how people will always be there to support one in times of need. How love can go past the boundaries and that together, we can overcome these issues that consume us and raise our voice.

image:image.image:title: Allison Red
image:image.image:caption: this film about a Jewish girl during the Polish invasion and after losing her best friend when she was younger she is sent thru obsticals and hoping to find true love once more.

image:image.image:title: The Protectors
image:image.image:caption: When an ancient alien race in charge of all life within the Universe passes judgement on Mankind to save Earth, one of their own will endanger his species’ existence to save us.

image:image.image:title: The Cold War
image:image.image:caption: When two rival Powers threaten the world with all-out war, the choice of a virtuous woman will decide the fate of Mankind.

image:image.image:title: VAC
image:image.image:caption: A tech-savvy bachelor's life becomes hell when he buys VAC, a new, coveted cutting-edge robot cleaner turned self-aware.

image:image.image:title: Disengaged
image:image.image:caption: Adam despises his job and has been working in the same office at the same desk for 10 years. He notices that society has been overruled by technology, resulting in people becoming antisocial and distant. He wants to change that by reconnecting with an old friend, Hayden and by building a Signal Jamming Device with her. Once the device is completed both Adam and Hayden take a trip to his work where Hayden switches off the power and lets the Signal Jammer work its magic. The device not only disables phones but something else happens which will change Adam's life forever.
image:image.image:geo_location: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

image:image.image:title: UN'OMBRA IN VIAGGIO - A shadow on a journey
image:image.image:caption: -In questo cortometraggio vediamo un'ombra che esprimere il desiderio di staccarsi dal corpo per avere una vita propria e così fare finalmente un suo viaggio. Ma dove può andare un'ombra da sola? Deciderà quindi di fare un viaggio dentro se stessa, per scoprire se stessa. --------------------------------------------------------------------- - In this short film we see a shadow that express the desire to separate from body to have a own life and so finally make a trip. But where can a shadow go alone? Then decide to take a trip in itself, to discover herself.

image:image.image:title: Night at the Studio
image:image.image:caption:
A Short Film observing Marilyn Monroe's first performance at the Actors Studio.
Staring Gracie Rae (Gallegos)

image:image.image:title: My Best Friend
image:image.image:caption: A Story of the Friendship test , Sometimes nothing is as it seems Can you always trust to your best friend ? Some People just act like They are trying to help you ...

image:image.image:title: Finding Nora (Short)
image:image.image:caption: The story of a missing 9-year-old girl. Disappears from Sunday school. Her Mother lets the grief overtake her. But she has to move on. The story of betrayal, lies, courage, scandal, and forgiveness.

image:image.image:title: Guys

image:image.image:title: Witness Short (Wedding Dream Sequence)

image:image.image:title: PERFECTVILLE
image:image.image:caption: A teenage girl awakens from an eleven years coma with no memory of her past in the year 2050 in peaceful Perfectville, a modernized city with a 1950’s appeal. In Perfectville everyone is beautiful, wealthy and perfect in every way without sin or so it appears. Trying to regain her memory she finds herself adapting to the extravagant lifestyle that appears to be “perfect”. But when the image of perfection fades, the more she begins to ponder if everything is really based on perception.

image:image.image:title: X7: Origins Short Film Part 1
image:image.image:caption:
X7 ORIGINS is an Action-Drama Short Film centered around an eighteen-year old alien lifeform named Xander Sevens who ended up on Earth five years ago with no memory of his past. Now fully adapted to the world thanks to his adopted father, Scientist Malik Sevens, Xander searches for answers of his birth Place, PlanetZenon better known as Planet X all while dealing with issues of his sexuality, keeping his powers a secret and saving the world from an evil force out to destroy him.
X7 ORIGINS was created as a marketing tool for New Sneaker Line X7 Supreme which will launch in conjunction with the film.
www.x7supreme.com- Official X7 Sneaker's Website
X7 ORIGINS is written by esteemed newcomer Dante Black (Credits: T.R.A.D.E It All, Vampire G, H.E The Film)
DONATE to officially fund Season 1: https://www.gofundme.com/X7ORIGINS

And she is a virgin. This short story tells the story of the night she lost her virginity.

image:image.image:title: The School of Life // Cultural Mining
image:image.image:caption: "Ultimately, life is only 700,000 hours long so we have to make sure the ideas we need don’t get lost – or take too long to find." - Alain de Botton This is what the The School of Life does, they sift through the most valuable parts of culture, then mine, extract, and remould it into practical advice to help us maintain our sanity in modern day life. To read more on cultural mining: thebookoflife.org/cultural-mining/ To find out more about The School of Life: theschooloflife.com/london/
image:image.image:geo_location: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

image:image.image:title: wars and game
image:image.image:caption: In the previous days (January 2016) a video about an operation by the state forces was aired on social media, ... The video was not from Syria; it was a skirmish between the state and its own citizens in our geography. the video, three masked younglings, the items in their hands, and their intentions cannot thoroughly be perceived.However, as the state forces seemed to be in a good command of everything at the time and created the impression that they were at ease controlling the incident, the ‘mortal’ attack took place. Such videos might be circulated through the current period of ‘war’, On the other hand, they convey dialogues full of phrases like ‘wait, he’ll be down’, ‘we shot him down’ that are frequent in computer games and that can be considered as ‘alienation’ in a humanistic manner. ... The two-and-a half minute video in question was aired on Rudaw Turkish News. In that news, the discussions between the policemen were particularly focused on. It is also stated in the news that an officer was praying “Enfal Sura” from the Quran, and that this sura had a place in the Kurdish collective memory in connection with the pogroms by the BAAS regime in Southern Kurdistan. (rudaw-türkçe /'Silvan'da 'ENFAL' kur?unlar?!' news and movie, 7.1.2016)

image:image.image:title: Masks
image:image.image:caption: Are human relations a game of power?Is there a line that should never be crossed?Based on a true story, a screenplay on human communication. Two people that do not know each other, meet in a warehouse. They want to communicate through erotic games of submission. However, as lines are crossed, their masks fall ahd their real characters are revealed. Based on a theatrical play of Georgia Chioni called "X".

image:image.image:title: Something To Save You

And now everyone of them is ready to be sacrificed for the other one.
And WHAT can save them now?...

Paul, a young man whose parents had been killed wants to join the rebellion. his handlers hope to convince him to kill on elf the man responsible for the death of his parents. Paul is torn between his thirst for revenge and the reality of killing a man. The war will decide for him.
image:image.image:geo_location: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

image:image.image:title: The Last Sin
image:image.image:caption: In the middle of the dry desert, at the first glance which seems to be a usual situation for everyone - gangster tries to kill a good man, in this case a priest. However, if you listen closely to gangster's words, everything becomes not as usual as it seems at the first glance.

image:image.image:title: Every Drop Counts
image:image.image:caption: For most of us living in cities with dependable amenities, drought is something we see on TV or read on newspapers. Even if not for all the 24 hours, water does come to our houses and taps. This probably gives us an emotional distance from the people, animals, birds and landscapes affected by a drought. Because of this, we fail to understand that our actions have an impact too! This film is an attempt to build that bridge. It tells the two sides of a story, on one screen. It gives the full picture.

image:image.image:title: CASSANDRA IS NOT ALONE
image:image.image:caption: A stalked woman, ex violinist, hides in a new city and makes friends with extravagant neighbor, who helps her to believe in musical talent. After a car accident, she is saved by the her stalker, a manipulative and violent man, who starts to see her and kills her out of jealousy. But the girl isn’t dead… She goes back to the time of the accident and, awaking in clinic, realizes that she has imagined her tragic future. Now she has the opportunity to change it, resuming her career and rebelling against the man.

image:image.image:title: They don't tolerate
image:image.image:caption:
A young girl goes to an organisation for a job. She is an MA in software engineering with top marks, she has taken specialised and creditable courses, and she is good at English and French. After studying her file, the managers decide to employ her. She gives a photo, without makeup and with full hijab, for employment and she is employed for a period of probation.
The girl has many qualifications. In addition to being a skilled software engineer, she likes modelling too. So she goes to a modelling institute and she is accepted there too.
The girl’s photos are printed on the cover of magazines. She is wearing beautiful clothes and makeup, and she is publicising some goods in the photos. It angers the managers of the organisation she is working in a period of probation and they fire her.
The girl sends her CV abroad. When the managers of a company overseas see her good CV, they decide to employ her, but they change their mind when they see her photo with hijab.

image:image.image:title: Bloody Throne
image:image.image:caption: Long time ago lived a king with his two sons, the elder son had ambitions like school and he went away to study. The younger son stepped up as a king after the kings death and the elder returned and demanded his throne, however the younger brother killed him not knowing that the coming generation would suffer for his sin.

image:image.image:title: Redress
image:image.image:caption:
Jake’s wife and daughter were the apple of his eye. After he overcame alcoholism, he lived for his family and not much else. This all changed when his family was killed in a drunk driving accident. Suddenly his world was turned upside down. Expecting justice, he’s outraged when a liberal judge lets the offender off the hook with two charges of vehicular manslaughter.
After the justice system fails him, Jake spirals into a deep depression. Jake spends his nights drinking, looking to escape the pain. One night he stumbles into a bar and has a chance meeting with a Neo-Nazi bartender who offers Jake a solution that will change his life forever.

image:image.image:title: The Blood Blessing
image:image.image:caption:
The Blood Blessing is a family drama about how siblings have each other’s back when someone in their family is dealing with a life difficulty.
Sarah, Eric and Robert are siblings who run a coffee shop together. Their new employee, Amy, accuses Robert of sexually assaulting her. Everyone blames Robert without even trying to defuse the situation, including his siblings.
Robert’s world turns into chaos and he does not know how to fix the situation. He seeks a psychiatrist for help.
The psychiatrist tells him about an ancient Chinese spell which he can perform by using his own blood. Through the magic, he realizes how his siblings try to protect him without letting him worry.

image:image.image:title: Love, Armenian Style
image:image.image:caption: Imagine feeling like you will be single forever and then in one moment realizing that if you've known your soul mate for two years! It happened to me and she... well she happened to be on the other side of the world. Love, Armenian Style is the story of my hilarious, life changing journey to get married, from the teeming security at JFK International Airport, through the streets of Armenia, and all the way to the altar! - See more at: http://www.talentville.com/screenplay/5790#sthash.FQyaGNHE.dpuf

image:image.image:title: Dual Relationships
image:image.image:caption: Concept- “In the field of health and medicine, a “dual relationship” is a relationship where multiple roles exist between practitioners and their clients.” In the pilot, Dave Barrett is introduced as a licensed massage therapist in his mid-thirties that moves his family to a small upstate New York town to pursue a better life. Although he loves what he does, lately he has become disenchanted by how the business has become overrun with illegal practices which are slowly destroying his livelihood. Dave’s cynicism is paired with a straight forward biting wit which sets him apart from the average massage therapist. Dave learns very quickly that small town living is not all it’s cracked up to be. Early on he meets a client that has ulterior motives for befriending him. Next, he finds himself in the middle of a kidnapping investigation. Before he knows it, Dave is unwittingly thrown into a world where greed reigns supreme and the people involved will stop at nothing to get their way, whether it be financially or emotionally. Ultimately, Dave learns a valuable lesson, “Be careful what you wish for.” Unfortunately for Dave, he might learn that lesson too late.

image:image.image:title: The Lost Trace
image:image.image:caption:
Pride. Purpose. Promise. These are some qualities that embed deep within these signboards. The rich heritage - each individual story has a past. A past for the future to savour. In addition of the vast knowledge, the History and build up of the name, is being displayed proudly atop each shopfront. Weathering all the challenges throughout the test of time.
This traditional signboards are losing their popularity amongst younger business owners. Contemporary choice of business name replaces real business owner's name in our modern society.
we like to showcase the deeper meaning of these signboards in the hope to preserve traditions and ignite interest for such dying trade.

image:image.image:title: Tides of November
image:image.image:caption: A new populist POTUS is shown a previously unseen tape of the Kennedy assassination with the killers clearly seen. A veiled threat to play with the Deep State, which controls the direction of the whole world. Will he comply?

image:image.image:caption: Every life has its own journey, every journey has its own story. Read between the life.
For this music video I decided to create my new year's eve of 2013 full of fun and fireworks. I also invited the same people whom I spend that day to be featured in this video.

image:image.image:title: Stand Tall!
image:image.image:caption: A romantic comedy spin on the popular sci-fi subgenre, the "giant woman" movie, a casino waitress -- accidentally tripled in stature to more than 16 feet tall -- literally becomes the biggest star in Vegas, a beloved showroom headliner. She then must rescue her kidnapped scientist boyfriend (whose mishap enlarged her) from a blackmailing mobster.
