image:image.image:title: THE LAST DREAM
image:image.image:caption: We like big challenges, so we developed “The Last Dream”: an animation project for a new virtual reality platform with a spherical vision of 360°. Waking up in an old wizard’s dark attic, where his spirit still wanders, is just the introduction to this virtual experience where dark, mysterious and gloomy things happen, capable of bewitching any spectator in the mood of getting swept up by the fantastic and the unexpected.e the above example but flipped.

image:image.image:title: Chalk Dust - Trailer
image:image.image:caption:
A young orphan who has been locked away by a cruel headmistress discovers what appears to be an ordinary piece of chalk hidden away. However there seems to be more to this simple piece of chalk than meets the eye.
This is the trailer to my university film Chalk Dust

image:image.image:title: The Trap Trailer
image:image.image:caption:
ALPHA PAPA meets THE TEXAS CHAIN SAW MASSACRE in this high-octane comedy horror.
Two groups vie for the same loot, a hoard of treasure buried deep within a vast, abandoned Victorian bathhouse. But they are not alone.
Why are they being hunted? Who will survive the night? When will the next trap be sprung?
image:image.image:geo_location: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

image:image.image:title: The unique principality in the Balkans
DILEMMA
image:image.image:caption: A short film on the importance of taking the HIV test and collecting the result.

image:image.image:title: Rhizophora (Trailer)
image:image.image:caption:
It has been forty years since the Vietnam War. Yet, its toxic remnants are not fading. Dancing between waking and dreaming, "Rhizophora" follows eleven Vietnamese youth, with disabilities caused by Agent Orange, on a whimsical and intimate journey through their day. As the film progresses we are welcomed ever deeper into their richly symbiotic world.
“Rhizophora” was conceived of and realized in a collaborative process between the featured group of residents and the Berlin based performing arts duo ¿Che.Ne.So?. It is both a meditation on the lasting impact of war as well as an ode to the power of life, which can flourish in even the most toxic of circumstances.

image:image.image:title: Trailer of the short film "Dilemma"
image:image.image:caption: Trailer of the short film "DIlemma"

image:image.image:title: Nira
image:image.image:caption: This story is about a boy who's only addiction in life was love and what happens after wards when his only console in life left him,the way his addictions transform to shorten his life is depicted in this short film giving you something to think wide.

image:image.image:title: XX
image:image.image:caption: For 2 billion years female (XX) was the only sex in nature. "XX" is a film about XXs, their hopes, freedom, desperation, captivity, and so on. A multi-dimensional film which anyone can get anything he/she wants from it, sort of self-explanatory...

image:image.image:title: Muftnosh - A short film based on a story by Saadat Hasan Manto!
image:image.image:caption: Muftnosh is based on a Saadat Hasan Manto tale about the different kinds of freeloaders that cigarette smokers encounter. Narrated beautifully in Urdu this B&W film successfully recreates the old world charm of pre-partition India. The film tries to do full justice to the faintly sarcastic tone of Manto’s writings.

image:image.image:title: Jackie Claxton Teen Teleporter: The Prevention
image:image.image:caption: Jackie Claxton, a human that works for an angel, deals with school bullies.

image:image.image:title: JoJo
image:image.image:caption: When her best friend lands a hot date despite her urging to settle, JoJo jumps at the chance to live out her part in the rom com of life, but ends up in a different role than the one she believes she fits into.

image:image.image:title: Jackie Claxton Teen Teleporter: The Influence.
image:image.image:caption: Jackie Claxton, a human working for an angel, is selected to stop a woman who is influencing teens to do evil.

image:image.image:title: Batman vs. Superman Hawaii
image:image.image:caption: This is a fan film about Batman vs. Superman that takes place in Hawaii. It is a silent film with music.

image:image.image:title: Grano
image:image.image:caption: Antônio Cassiano, known by everyone as "Tio Tonho" (Uncle Tonho), every day sets about the task of arranging grains on the table on his verandah - mainly grains of corn - and then removing them one by one. As a result of his pastime and this patient "choreography", every day, the surface of the table is composed differently, always producing a beautiful image. The video becomes a tool for reflection on "disabilities", the collective and the subtle relations between space and time. In Antônio’s hands, each grain occupies an importance place.

image:image.image:title: VeganTails
image:image.image:caption: A group of vegan friends commit murder against a hunter when they rescue a bunny from being shot. They then must journey to find a new home for the bunny while evading the law for their crime in this 100% USDA organic adventure.

image:image.image:title: The Strength Within You - A Suicidal Matter
image:image.image:caption: Whether the decision is done by herself or simply admitting she needs help, she finds the need to be stronger than her wiliness to end her life.

image:image.image:title: The Strength Within You - Domestic Violence
image:image.image:caption: A woman being abused has her limits. One day, she has to find the strength within her to fight back and regain her dignity.

image:image.image:title: Don't Look Under Your Bed
image:image.image:caption: Someone moves from one apartment to another and it leads to some disastrous consequences, as things that go bump in the night are not merely dreams...

image:image.image:title: The Tyger
image:image.image:caption:
This creation is based on the poem 'The Tyger' by William Blake, who wrote this in 1794.
This video is dedicated to my grandma, Shanti Jegathesan, as this poem has great significance to our family.
The video was made using iClone 6 3D Animation Software
Voice Narration: Radheya Jegatheva (Intro), Perth Modern School Jay Jay Jegathesan (poem) University of Western Australia
CONTACT: jay.jay@uwa.edu.au, jayjayaustralia@hotmail.com

image:image.image:title: Judi Dench is Cool in Person
image:image.image:caption: Two actors, one bookie and a very bad day. Judi Dench is Cool in Person is fast, funny and only a little bit nasty.

image:image.image:title: Bock Saga - Welcome to Rajasthan
image:image.image:caption:
This is new big video connected to Bock Saga. Jim Chesner, goes to Pushkar (Rajasthan, India) to tell new parts of the Saga: Story of Krishna Story of Narkasura King Story of Heart Something about Circoncision Story of Gipsies
Correction: The Maharajah was the Rabi and the Rajah was the jarl or earl..Jim
Paypal - keetcinema@gmail.com for our videos.
Welcome to everybody who UNDERSTAND!

image:image.image:title: SAR
image:image.image:caption: Having woken up in a small bungalow on an ocean coast, our hero doesn't remember from where is he and how he appeared here. Day by day he is covered by the increasing hopelessness and melancholy. The people meeting to him on the way don't understand what he is telling and can't give answers to his questions. The psychologist, neighbors, the new friend can't help him as the answer lies not outside, and inside. At the moment of blank despair, the hero rushes to the sea and, cast ashore, has a fatal dream. Finished excessively, he decides to walk without purpose. Infinite wandering brings him into the desert where on a hair from death, under the scorching sun, happens a wonderful meeting. The mysterious stranger perfectly understands his speech and promises to bring him to his "house”. But where actually will bring them these wanderings? Perhaps on a meeting with himself?

image:image.image:title: Bock Saga - Welcome to Hel
image:image.image:caption: Secret side of Finland. The mythology connected with one of the most ancient stories around the world. The Saga told from creation of the world which was transmitted presently by Ior Bock. In the film, we will go together with Jim Chesnar in places connected with the Bock Saga. We will visit islands, caves, the real North Pole, the most ancient castle on the planet, we will open many secrets and we will visit a place of burial of Ior Bock.

image:image.image:title: The surprise dance
image:image.image:caption: This short film is presented regarding the nature of modern human relationships using a few number of characters.Impatience which is connected with modern love affairs and the connection between relationships and the technology is highly depicted here.The film flows and ends wakening the imagination in people's minds.

image:image.image:title: The Runner
image:image.image:caption: An exploration in the practice of persistence. From day to day, this aging man continues to jog, awaking in the early morning and running until sunset. He does this without any reason besides his own. For him, this is more than just exercise, it is freedom. Above all, this film is meant to look at our practices and why we do the things we do.

image:image.image:title: The Wicker Husband
image:image.image:caption: A story of love in all shapes, sizes, and materials. Completed as part of the Intermediate Animation course at SUNY Fredonia.

image:image.image:title: Living Places (passaword: #soon2016)
image:image.image:caption: What if all our feelings and experience were arrested inside the places we lived, all our desires, all our pieces? One place. Many stories.

image:image.image:title: Aftab
image:image.image:caption: Based on Pakistan Iran Border Human Trafficking .

image:image.image:title: Under Siege of Knowing
image:image.image:caption: 'Under Siege of Knowing' is a short tale about encountering the unknown, and the feelings of fear and curiosity that come with it. In the film, a teenage boy is tormented by the presence of a demon-like creature for three days before farewelling his everyday life and running off into something he knows nothing about.

image:image.image:title: The Defendant
image:image.image:caption: When our actions lead us to the inevitable judgment of our choices, the imminence of a condemnation is the presage of the truths that we kept in our consciousness. The Defendant is a movie that allows us watching the presage between the conflicts of a man and the fatal consequence of his actions. A fragment of a hidden time.

image:image.image:title: Do Not Touch
image:image.image:caption:
A cleaner on the night shift finds a very inviting button that says 'Do Not Tounch'.
A one minuet film inspired by the random switchs I find in my own home.
image:image.image:geo_location: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

image:image.image:title: Practical Guide To Choose The Couch Of Your Dreams
image:image.image:caption: In the apartament where André and Lisa live, an old and comfortable couch shelter and protect them from the daily annoyance. While they are pressured to fit in a pre-determinate life style, both need to decide between buy a new couch or keep the old one, The decisions, however, are not so simple, because comfort and convenience can get mixed up.

image:image.image:title: In the Room
image:image.image:caption: Filip spends the evening doing physics homework and listening to music when he hears someone scream...

image:image.image:title: Rinoceronte - As Cores
image:image.image:caption: Brazil stoner rock band.

image:image.image:title: Fidan Jafarova Film Portrait
image:image.image:caption: The 21 years of my life and a beginning of a new chapter.

image:image.image:title: Samson
image:image.image:caption: Experience the Old Testament story with a modern twist.

image:image.image:title: Oblivion
image:image.image:caption: Sophie is a young ambitious woman who wants to become a real writer. She has got a last chance to write a bestseller or she'll be out of a job. As she begins to write she becomes too focused on her book and her real life is pulled out from under her feet. She tries to find out what is going on, but she's not able to realize what is real and what is her imagination. This is a film about writers and all types of artists whose art becomes their only life.

image:image.image:title: UNNAMED FEELING
image:image.image:caption: Seven friends have settled on a paradise island and unknown. Despite this beautiful landscape, unhealthy situations will invite into their paradise. These unhealthy situations reveal the reason for their presence on this island.

image:image.image:title: Matthew’s Passion
image:image.image:caption: Matthew, a young photographer of 20 years expresses his life through his photography. His madness often visits his passion.

image:image.image:title: In bed with Thaïlande
image:image.image:caption: Immersion journey in Thailand leaded by a camera that gives a mysterious expression of each element and landscape it crosses A documentary produced by Métrages Productions written and directed by Alix VERONEZE

image:image.image:title: Número 2 (Number 2)
image:image.image:caption:
(SUBTITLES IN ENGLISH IN YOUTUBE )
Ferran has spent his whole life feeling like a number two . He has never excelled in anything as a child and has been in the shadow of his great brother , Victor. One day decides to turn your life 180 degrees.

image:image.image:title: Shoot Her - Life of an Actor
image:image.image:caption: "Shoot Her - Life of an Actor" is a short silent film about an aspiring actress and her passage through the many phases of fame. This actress is very talented, motivated and has a very strong aspiration to become a superstar i.e metaphorically Shot by the Camera. Thanks to her talents and simple minded pursuit of the life before the camera, she eventually does get noticed for her potential. This leads to a period of rapid growth in fame and adulation of fans and a fabulous life in the full public gaze. The actress really starts to enjoy her life as a celebrity.

image:image.image:title: THE DRAGON´S SON
image:image.image:caption: Jameson Notodofilmfest: notodofilmfest.com/#/Buscador/Ficha/32028/; Festival de Cine Fantástico de Terror de Sants 2012: cotxeres-casinet.org/marato/castellano/2012/lunes12.htm; Mercado de cortometrajes de Europa y Latinoamérica: alcine.org/shortlatino/Shortlatino; Festival internacional VOFF3 2014: viewster.com/movie/1272-18327-000/the-dragons-son/; Puerto Rico Horro Film Fest: horrorpr.com/PRHFF14_eng/Program.html; Depth of Field 2015: dofiff.com/frameindex.htm; Won Depth of Field 2015: dofiff.com/Pages pring%202015%20Winners.html ;

image:image.image:title: Our World
image:image.image:caption: Love story between a man and a woman at a mental institute. Won 6 awards and was officially selected 13 times in film festivals | SYNOPSIS: Someone once said "Those who prefer sanity and flee from madness are unable to feel true love". As in every love story this one has a man and a woman as main characters, although it takes place at a mental institute. Dave and Sarah had been interned for a long time but their eyes had never met before... until that day. It was love at first sight and from that moment on, each one of them would leave their own world to build one together.

image:image.image:title: Serge Bulat - Walker
image:image.image:caption: "Queuelbum" is a 2-part experience project by NYC music artist Serge Bulat. The time-inspired album is an experiment in instrumental music, visuals, philosophy and conceptual art. "Walker" - is the first experience piece from "Queuelbum" and serves as an introduction to the darker side of the project, entitled "Q25". The creators of the music video unveiled "Walker's" code name "IIWABOYS", which stands for "If I Were A Bug On Your Shoulder" and hints at the message of the video.

image:image.image:title: Déjà Vu
image:image.image:caption: A 12 episodes sci-fi thriller that tells the story of a young man who can see tragedies before they happen and therefore having the opportunity to change them. The web series has won 14 awards from some of the most prestigious web series festivals.

image:image.image:title: Space Invaders
image:image.image:caption: A diying planet, a cruel dictator and Earth in danger.. Using their 80s skills, BEnn & Slip product a geek vid remembering past wars : AMIGA vs ATARI, COMMODORE vs AMSTRAD...

image:image.image:title: Blood Bank Burglar(password:5487)
image:image.image:caption: Starving poor vampire sneaked into a blood bank in a hospital at midnight to find some blood to drink, but out of expectation, he bumped into a tough staff and got into a big fight...

The short movie „3.“ was created as a result of a couple of years of research. Throughout this period we conducted interviews with both men and women concerning the topic of relationships. Women's thoughts and experiences on love, loss and betrayal have by far made the biggest impact, provoking us to dwell on these matters, being that such questions seem to be timeless and still without response, even in the 21st century. What is a woman's true role in society nowadays? Is the label of the „ideal silent and obedient wife who's place is in the kitchen“ still impeding with her freedom, disguised as modern day fantasies of sex toys and mischievous corporate bunnies? In the 14 minutes of this movie we have tried to dive into these questions by telling a story of one young woman.

image:image.image:title: Insignificant Choices trailer
image:image.image:caption: A man returning from work wonders which road he should follow home.

image:image.image:title: Bleu, Blanc, Pourpre et Néonville
image:image.image:caption: Some young women some boys and a cat step into a blue white and purple world...then this world changes it's own nature into some virtual spaces where they meet a seducing artificial intelligence. flying into these colored spaces listening to the harp songs The boy is questionning his own feelings about the love he has for a girl.

image:image.image:title: The Pursuit
image:image.image:caption:
After getting off a Rapid KL bus, Sam, a 13 year old boy realized he had left his precious sketchbook in it.
Without hesitation, he ventures on a journey of unknown locations to pursue the bus before the book is gone forever.

image:image.image:title: Touch the Stars. Time-Lapse 4K.
image:image.image:caption:
This video was recorded close to Shirokovskaya hydrostation (Russia, Perm region). The hydrostation was built mostly by German prisoners of war during the world war second years. Video shows satellites motion, Perseids star stream and the Milky Way. Almost 2000 frames were made for 8 recording hours.
Music: Brandon Liew — Mystic Forest (Orchestral / Fantasy)

image:image.image:title: Gaule, 2028
image:image.image:caption: fun & colored music cartoon ... first only places, then dancing characters full of joy.

image:image.image:title: Franks Wildest Year
image:image.image:caption: Frank hung his wild years on a nail that he drove through his wives forehead. After watching his wife burn, Frank heads north, laughing as he unknowingly approaches his sinister end.
image:image.image:geo_location: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

image:image.image:title: My Own Blood (Thriller)
image:image.image:caption: This is a story of a 12 years girl who was raped and abused, by her uncle, but because of fear and no one to confide in, she became so traumatized and ended up developing bad habits, like smoking and drinking excessively and was always sad. She finally regained her self nine years after when she let out the secret to her entire family. So in all, not all strange behaviors are caused by influence, some are caused by the traumas we have been through.

image:image.image:title: How I Met Spielberg
image:image.image:caption: Armando Molina II, a self taught filmmaker from a poor village outside of Madrid, wakes up one morning and thinks of the impossible: a chance to meet Steven Spielberg. Without speaking a word of English, Armando sets out to Los Angeles in the hopes of meeting his unsuspecting mentor and to thank him for making the world a better place through his films. But what starts as wishful thinking, turns into one man's brave adventure. The documentary records Armando's journey from a Spanish pueblo to the Hollywood Hills, where he struggles through homelessness, fatigue and industry giants. With only a dollar in his pocket, Armando surpasses many people's expectations, and during his seemingly impossible mission to find his elusive idol, he finds himself.

image:image.image:title: Oh, Dear Luke or (An Undestined Character's Film) TRAILER
image:image.image:caption: A film director is trying to get his lazy main character to do something worthwile with his life.

image:image.image:title: Bittersweet Official Trailer
image:image.image:caption: Putri Zya (Zya), 8 years old average primary school student has been separated with mother sice divorced. Zya has not meet her mother since divorce because of her father does not give permission to meet with some unknown reason. One day Zya decide to invite her father to come on her school report card day without her father knowledge. After a moment meet her mother (Natasha), Natasha need to leave her again. Zya decide to make scene by crying out loud and forcing her mother to take home. Natasha decide to bring her to her father house. On her way back to her father house, Zya discover her mother poorness at petrol station. Zya mature come when she saw her mother cry and felt that her false causing her late for interviewed. Now she understand about her mother situations and she know the reason why her mother could not meet her.

image:image.image:title: Gloomy Boy
image:image.image:caption: Directed by: Reshan Fernando Music: FloidBeats Track: Orchestral Dubstep Serendipity Shot on: iPhone 5s Synopsis: “Stop violence & save the childhood” Word from the Director: As usually I would like to talk about some real problems and stories coming from all around the world through my film creations. But I never focusing one certain family, people or any kind of group in here. And this is also a very common story happening all around the world, which is the parents get in to fight in front of their kids and getting separate or divorce. I just want to spread the word that saying those things are happening in the world, lets try to think and stop it. Specially because kids are the future of our world. So from this creation I tried to talk about a fiction story which is mom & dad fighting in the house and kids living so frighten, so how the kids react inside these kind of situation by showing their strange behaviour. From "Gloomy Boy" I bringing this fiction story created by me from the kid's point of view to the audience, so i think this what make it special. And I should mention the Boy who's act in this video did a great job, so someone may feel it as real than fiction. Thank you. Dir. Reshan Fernando Silent Entertainment Production Paris. Trailer: vimeo.com/107764713 © 2014. All Rights Reserved. *** Award: Best Actor Male on International Kids Festival 2016 in Madrid, Spain ***. *** Award: Best Film on Pocket Cinema Film Festival 2015 Pakistan *** ::::: Official selected to the 5th iPhone Film Festival 2015 Beverly Hills, CA, USA ::::: ::::: Official selection to the International Mobile Film Festival 2015 San Diego, CA, USA ::::: ::::: Official Selection Cinephone - International Short Films Festival with SMARTPHONE 2015 Barcelona, Spain ::::: ::::: Official Selection Fanboy Film Festival 2016 USA ::::: IMDb: imdb.com/title/tt4619856 IMVDb : imvdb.com/video/floidbeats/gloomy-boy

image:image.image:title: Duel on the banks of the Mauldre
image:image.image:caption:
Diego is a lone pistolero, roaming the deserted streets of the town of Maule. When he arrives in town to face his old enemy Crazy Joe, Diego is under the scornful scrutiny of the townsfolk and in particular, the sheriff. Only Jane, a young and beautiful maid, seems to welcome the arrival of Diego with any friendliness. Diego and Joe prepare for their duel… But is all this real?
My name is Mehdi Noblesse, I'm a psychologist who works in a center for disabled workers in France near Paris. "Duel on the banks of the Mauldre" is a part of a cinema therapy activity that I set in order to help disabled people to overcome their difficulties by using cinema. "Duel on the banks of the Mauldre" is our 2nd shortfilm. We are now working on a documentary about one of our worker. And we are already preproducing our 2017 movie, an horror comedy...

image:image.image:title: In articulo mortis
image:image.image:caption: Supernatural powers, hunting a serial killer with the same capabilities.

image:image.image:title: The Living God : Cure of the Civilization (official trailer )
image:image.image:caption:
Meetei Civilization flourish in the ancient land called kangleipak which now belongs to the north-eastern region of India bordering Burma. The civilization is known to study and illustrate microscopic and cellular form of Human-body . Lai or God of the civilization still continues to communicate with the descendant of the civilization
And the medicine is one such inheritance from the ancestors (read God) of this civilization and is known to cure various of the modern diseases of our time.

image:image.image:title: IS IT OR IS IT NOT! IndieWise Official Selection.
image:image.image:caption: From start to finish in 7 minutes the episode unfolds & ends on a surprise, mysterious note. The surprise is the existence of the mysterious spirits or the jinn’s. Though rarely seen but they are there, all around us. Only with whom it happens can believe in them. So, “IS IT OR IS IT NOT!” is the message for other fellow human beings. It can happen to anybody, you or me! A boy and a girl meet suddenly in a coffee shop. The girl tries to prove her acquaintance with the boy, but the boy does not recognize her. The girl again tries to prove her identity by giving past references, but the boy is not convinced. Exasperated the girl makes her last attempt and suddenly disappears, vanishes into thin air, leaving the boy stupefied, staggered.

image:image.image:title: IS IT OR IS IT NOT! (Teaser) Official Selection.
image:image.image:caption: From start to finish in 7 minutes the episode unfolds & ends on a surprise, mysterious note.

image:image.image:title: The Virgin Flower
image:image.image:caption: Based upon the best-selling indie video-game "Hotline Miami", The Main Character "Jacket", receives a message about a gang that has kidnapped an innocent young girl, whom they plan to do horrendous acts to. Jacket, on the another hand isn't the type of guy to just standby, so he takes up matters into his own hands...literally.

image:image.image:title: Requiem
image:image.image:caption: It is the story of a young composer, with whom we will be acquainted throughout his life experiences, both bitter and sweet. While he is on the verge of success, he starts taking drugs and consequently, he is addicted, that leads to his death. In the process of the story, it happens that the young composer plays chess with the angel of death, and they bet on his life. The whole movie alludes to the movies Requiem for a Dream by Darren Aronofsky and The Seventh Seal by Ingmar Bergman.

image:image.image:title: THE DRIVER
image:image.image:caption:
In a context of economic crisis and global values, the driver raises the possibility of direct action and popular relief directed to a representative of economic power, by his chauffeur.
But beware, the victory may be your mutilation.

image:image.image:title: Whisper Down the Lane
image:image.image:caption:
"Whisper Down the Lane" is an experimental music video collaboration among four Denver artists. Each of three musicians recorded two musical ideas and passed one to each other musician. Having received two primary tracks, each musician recorded secondary tracks onto the primary tracks. Secondary tracks were passed again, and tertiary tracks were recorded. All recorded layers were then passed to a videographer for visual content, recorded in Colorado.
One video was released each week, between March 26 and April 30, 2015.

She can not even recognize the flag of the country in which it reigns with her lion, as cheetah as she is. Uh, but true; it's not a lion?! it is more like a teenager who spends his life jocking during sports. Isn't she dreaming? According to the giraffe: maybe.

image:image.image:title: Adverse Universe

It implies that evil was always present in a place called "Apocalypse 11: 8" waiting to be summoned by an innocent soul, thus overcoming the good which is represented by "The Lady in White". Adverse Universe addresses life and death from an artist’s perspective, a world in which evil is always growing and celebrated by the masses.

image:image.image:title: Artificial Respiration
image:image.image:caption:
A Film About Human Behavior in Difficult Circumstances
Mount Damavand, also known as the roof of Iran, is 5671 high. This mount tempts almost all the professional climbers. To reach Damavand’s summit is considered as an honourable achievement for them. Although, many fail to accomplish this mission, some even lose their lives on the way. This movie follows a climbing team as they try to reach the summit of mount Damavand and face with some adventures and perils on their way. The movie also focuses on the complicated relations of the team members with each other.

Hamlet says whilst humans appear to think and act as superior beings, they are essentially "dust". Hamlet is expressing his melancholy to his old friends over the difference between what humans aspire to and how they act, which is a great divide that deeply depresses him.

image:image.image:title: Honorable Mention
image:image.image:caption:
“Honorable Mention” a film by Dhruva Harsh, based on the short story from the collection of “Song Without End And Other Stories” by novelist and short story writer Neelum Saran Gour. ''Honorable Mention'' won Best Screenplay award at Rolling Reels International Film Festival, Hyderabad-2015 and has got official Selection in the Prestigious the Kolkata International Film Festival (KIFF-2015) and recently got official selection in KSFF-2015 as well.
Story:Professor A. Das is well known in his field of Botany. This is a story of ''a person’s (botanist Prof A. K. Das) endless justification which gave him immense strength on every pedestal of failure, and his declaration that every failure was of invaluable profit to him. He is such a man who defends even his losses with such enthusiasm ". His protégé, Ramendram, who is unable to comprehend how he can help his friend, philosopher and guide Meanwhile, the work on the research is nearing completion, and the deadline for submission of a vital paper to the Seattle Conference is also upon them, and the three young research assistants devise a plan to help get their Professor out of the shadows and into the spotlight, all three research assistants of Dr. Abhijit Das send a paper to the Seattle Conference, U.S.A., fifteen days before when it was planned, after getting forge Das’s signature, but their attempts at changing the fate of their Professor remain just that, an attempt, as fate shows them it's inevitable and unfathomable face. All they can do in response is resign to the truth and move on.

image:image.image:title: LAS NOVIAS DEL DIABLO/THE DEVIL'S GIRLFRIENDS

They´re just looking for a few days of joy; and take some pictures for a tourism brochure. But they are atack by a cult that abducts women for offer them to the devil and have children. As a reward, the devil will bring the rains; so the members of the cult have good harvest.

She thinks that someone behind her is one of her friend. At last, she realize that she's the only one who stay at the dorm. Because all of her friends are coming back to their hometown. So, who's behind her?

image:image.image:title: The Story of Gin
image:image.image:caption: This animation is about the popular spirit Gin and its interesting and varied history. The style harks back to the early days of jazz music and cocktails, in its punchy music and strong, moody palette. The story covers Gin's popularity throughout the decades and particularly its inclusion in cocktails and the cocktail era of the early 1950s. Simple, graphic shapes and great palettes of rich colours were used to lend the retrospective feel that sums up Gin's character. Although it is an entirely digital animation, the line quality and paper texture convey a traditional hand drawn touch.

An irresistible drive takes her to a quest in search of clues of the Lost Continent and the paths chosen end up revealing aspects of her own course. Guided by the teachings of the mysterious Gahnende, Lissa tries to understand the binding threads between the Atlantes and the Guaranis and ends up discovering binding threads that redefine the way she understands the world and love.

image:image.image:title: The Living God : Medicine and The Ancient Meetei Civilization
image:image.image:caption:
Meetei Civilization flourish in the ancient land called kangleipak which now belongs to the north-eastern region of India bordering Burma.
The civilization is known to study and illustrate microscopic and cellular form of Human-body. Its Ancient Script epitomizes the advanced nature of its civilization . The form, structure and phonology reveal the understanding of human physiology.
Moreover, its ancient writing records their ancient knowledge on a widely varying subjects like astrology, astronomy, genetics, medicine, human physiology, predictions, the origin of life and the universe , and secrets of life and death. But most importantly, it writes about the mingling and relation between Lai ( ancestor God ) and Human.
Even today , Lai or God of the civilization still continues to communicate with the descendant of the civilization
But the volumes of this written record were almost wiped out from this civilization’s history due to the historical burning of puya in 17th Century .Despite this, Meetei civilization and culture continue to flourish. Many mentions of the ancient writing still continue to bloom on the fertile soil of this ancient land. And the medicine is one such inheritance from the ancestors (read God) of this civilization.
This ancient divine concoction of herbs is known to cure most of the modern diseases of the present society. The ardent believers of this culture from all walks of life still continue to use this medicine for various modern diseases. And they are in the pink of their health to give testimony about the healing power of this medicine of the Lai .

image:image.image:title: Bangla Short Film - Ochena Chaya (A Strange Shadow)

She gets involved in an assignment to cover an article on NIRMALA DEVI, a lady who claims to have an incarnated life. This short satirizes the workshop industry in the entertainment professions, whereby anxious hopefuls are sometimes preyed upon by those in the "business" whose primary interest is increasing their income, as opposed to an altruistic desire to impart actual knowledge they've gleaned in their own, often questionable, careers. Unexpected circumstances ensue.
Greg and Michael are writing partners. When Greg needs cash he comes up with a scheme to teach prospective writers how to maximize script pitching and places an ad in a lot of newspapers that yields unexpected results.

image:image.image:title: Lovestoying.
image:image.image:caption:

Sound Recordist- Dhawal Tandon.
Special Thanks to- Palak Jain, Nakul Sahdev, Himika Basu, Aisha Ahmed, Ritwik Bhowmik.
Music copyrights and credit with Indian Summer - Jónsi & Alex.
Description- Boy meets girl. Girl meets boy. They fall in love. Live happily ever after. Happy ending. Right? Wrong! Some love stories do not comprise of the usual ingredients of 'Lovestorying'. But that does not mean it's not love. Narrated through visual poetry and soul stirring music, Lovestorying is a short film about one such love story. Where our lovers are conflicted by their ideologies about love and what they feel for each other.

image:image.image:title: Bags and Buses
image:image.image:caption: In this semi silent short, a man (Kevin McKechney) finds a bag after missing his Bus stop. After searching inside the bag and obtaining the address of its beautiful owner (Dana Simone), the man ventures urban Los Angeles to return the bag. Daydreaming of the fateful encounter, awkward moments and crazy chases risk his chance at romance. Finally the reality does not meet the imagination he created and is left in the dark. Defeated and heading home, waiting at a bus stop, a lost woman opens the dialogue to something new. One door closes another opens.

image:image.image:title: Dralien
image:image.image:caption: A determined detective traces a missing author to the fantasy world she created and joins her fight against an evil sorcerer.

image:image.image:title: Jhilmil

image:image.image:title: Dream-Trailer
image:image.image:caption: Here is the trailer of my animation Dream which was my thesis project for Master's degree in animation. It has won the golden prize for best script write in the 9th Tehran international animation festival in 2015 and has been participated in numerous festivals around the world including USA, Canada, Germany, Italy, France among others. Moreover, It's been published in AVIFF catalog, Art film festival of Cannes. I always wonder what if we could freeze our memories for the day we miss that specific day, then thaw them out and live them for one more day as they are happening right now. It is a regular day to day life that is passing with daydreaming, the story of my grandfather's life in which we will live through one of his frozen memories.

image:image.image:title: I dont want to say anything, but (Trailer)
image:image.image:caption: "I dont want to say anything, but..." is a moment in three wardrobe stylist who work in the film commercials industry in Buenos Aires City. Ana (38), a successful Costume Designer, head of the team, Paul (33) his assistant and Laura (25) a newbie assistant, who had been making several mistakes and is sad about a recent separation with Juan. A moment of their lives. Labor relations mix with friendship. A reflection on the daily sport of watching and measuring the others. Criticism and gossiping as food for souls.

Our Graduation film about a story of a young boy looking for his long lost mom and a mom longing for the child that she lost.

image:image.image:title: The Salvation
image:image.image:caption: Salvation is the story of the human being who is searching for the identity and a meaning for life. A human who tries to be free from what the society force him to be .

image:image.image:title: Cleanliness Begins At 'Home'
image:image.image:caption: A 7 year old kid wakes up in the morning and peeps to watch his grand-father walking on a exercise machine. Feeling excited he follows his grand-father’s action and runs on the exercise stepper. Similarly he follows his grand fathers all activities and saves coins in piggy bank and plays with shaving brush. He is careful not to litter his pencil and paper waste during drawing. He draws a sketch on ‘India is my home’. Later he sees his grandfather throwing empty water bottle and banana skins to road from balcony. He imitates this action of his grandfather and spills all garbage from dust-bin on the floor. When grandfather gets the shock seeing this he shows him the garbage the grandfather has littered on road. Grandfather realize his mistake and at the end it is seen both of them are cleaning the garbage thrown by the grandfather on the road.

image:image.image:title: Rick of All Trades
image:image.image:caption: Rick Cameron has always taken the road less travelled. Whether it was playing semi-pro hockey, or his stint as the costumed mascot of a major North American transit authority, no one will ever say that Rick has led a dull life. He's entertained thousands as a musician, as a stand-up comedian, and through a professional clown business that he ran for many years. Rick and his wife, who is 21-years his junior, left the city many years ago for a quieter life in the country, but that entrepreneurial spirt remained. They both drove school bus, and now run an arts and crafts store, along with a wine business. No matter the challenges, including a heart attack, and the tragic suicide of a step-son, Rick's zest for life lives on. The musician, now 81, he has released several CDs and continues to perform stand-up comedy and play in a band. 'Rick of All Trades' details the life story of a truly extraordinary man.

image:image.image:title: Tinnitus Detritus Trailer
image:image.image:caption: A boy comes out of his university and wants to meet one of his friends, but no one sees him. This triggers an absurd world that he has not noticed before. Now he starts a journey to face the loneliness.

image:image.image:title: The Paris Syndrome
image:image.image:caption: The Paris Syndrome is a drama about a brother (Hank) and sister (Jackie) dealing with the recent loss of their family dog. Bereaved, they decide to attend a party to take their minds off the recent event. At the party, Hank and Jackie run into Joey, a former friend who is now employed as a janitor at the high school they attended as teens. Hank convinces Joey to let him into the high school after hours for a short time that night. While there, we witness a dark satirical scene play out.

image:image.image:title: Highway of Heroes - The Journey Home
image:image.image:caption:
Canada's war dead make a final journey down the Highway of Heroes, a stretch of Highway 401 that leads from a southern Ontario airbase to the Coroner's Office in downtown Toronto. In a gesture of support and national pride, thousands of flag-waving Canadians flocked to highway overpasses to help bear some of the weight of each family's loss.
'Highway of Heroes - The Journey Home' presents a view of the highway rarely seen; that of devastated family members, racked with grief, but overwhelmed by the unwavering support of fellow Canadians on the overpasses above.

image:image.image:title: Globos
image:image.image:caption: Globos es una historia de desamor, de amor y de globos.

image:image.image:title: Exile Speaks - TEASER
image:image.image:caption: Loneliness floods the room little by little. He wakes up to another night of exile. Did life become a nightmare or did the nightmare come to life?

image:image.image:title: A War Within
image:image.image:caption: The story of a soldier's traumatic past and the shocking affects on her life in the aftermath.

image:image.image:title: Nothing Important
image:image.image:caption: The short film recounts the personal conflicts of Marcelo Crespo, a manager of the Human Resources department, who has trouble firing people and the relationship of this problem with making decisions in your life.

image:image.image:title: Pele, My paradise
image:image.image:caption: PELE, My Paradise, presents a lyrical portrait of a remote island in the middle of the Pacific. An island where the perception of nature as something sacred becomes not only a view of life but a way of living as well, carried out in accordance with the rhythms of nature and of their traditions.

image:image.image:title: Los Angeles

image:image.image:title: Sweet As
image:image.image:caption: A young boy under the influence of a rapidly aging spell, uses special glasses to search the past for clues on who his mother is.

image:image.image:title: i promised
image:image.image:caption:
Bound by a promise he refuses to break, a timid man is unable to escape his toxic relationship and begins to lose himself along with his family.
This is a true story based on the psychological abuse men face in relationships, ones that most men are afraid to share with anyone.
The message is also to be very clear that most people are not care takers, and taking care of someone who has an illness, is a very tough challenge.

image:image.image:title: The Burning Tree
image:image.image:caption:
What begins as a father/son hike turns into a nightmarish trip that reveals secrets and exposes consequences.
The riveting film takes viewers by surprise with a sudden dark twist. After a successful festival run, the 10-minute psychological thriller that has left people speechless can now be seen for free.
?“Holy f&$ ten minutes and I'm still trying to catch my breath,” said one recent viewer. Another viewer said, “I'm still shaken up.” In just 10 minutes, THE BURNING TREE seems to leave a lasting impression on its viewers. ?

image:image.image:title: Herrings - Pilot Episode
image:image.image:caption: An out of work skip tracer gets the opportunity to use his skills in an innovative way only to discover he's bitten off ?more than he can chew. This episode of Herrings stars Dax Richardson and co-stars Mike Sutton and Lara Zakk.

image:image.image:title: Therapy
image:image.image:caption:
Ready to confront dark and haunting memories, a young Haitian-American woman named Jacqui seeks help from a psychologist. Dr. Barnes is a man who may be directly involved with the pain she went through as a young child.
Though heavily scarred, Jacqui will face her history at any cost. The hardest part for Jacqui will be deciding what she must do after confronting her demons. Can she and her doctor accept the consequences, as the sins of the past erupt into the present?

In response, the agency developed an attempt to communicate and make first contact. Songs For The Firmament is an abstract live concert movie exploring some of the strange phenomenon of the Pacific Northwest. Original music and live performances by Light Thieves, X Suns, & Mos Generator.

This short film has had 20 Official Festival Selections to date, screened in New York, Los Angeles, San Francisco Bay Area, the United Kingdom and Vancouver British Columbia in Canada and has won four Awards including Best Short Film for 2015 at Louisville's International Festival of Film.

However, Hero has to gamble his life in a game of chance to save his son. The director Koina Freeman directed another Sundance short that lead to her directing "America's Most Wanted". Film has been selected to be screened at the 2016 San Diego Black Film Festival.

image:image.image:title: Don Pedro loves Bella Donna in his garden
image:image.image:caption: The Earl of Arcum is morbidly jealous. He dresses up every evening at 6'clock in secret and turns into Don Pedro the steady beloved of his own wife. One day he takes revenge and poisons the gorgeous Bell and the artist with passion in the garden. It is to late, when the Earl of Arcum sees, he lost the love trough her blind jealousy.

image:image.image:title: THE POINT OF NO RETURN
image:image.image:caption: A scriptwriter, who is determined to succeed in the film industry, gets trapped in the world he creates.

image:image.image:title: ...i've seen love die
image:image.image:caption: Nona’s been estranged from her family for the past 10 years. When Nona made the decision to come out to her Mormon family about her sexuality the family persecuted her in front of the entire church, and she was excommunicated. Nona lost everything she ever knew with the raise of her father’s hand to cast the final vote of excommunication. Without a word Nona has lived without family and then the phone call came; her mother died. Nona’s heart is conflicted about whether to return to a home where she is hated, or to allow her mother’s death to go unnoticed as every other moment has for the past 10 years.

image:image.image:title: Vladimir Bogdanov's Dreams
image:image.image:caption: This is a film about legendary Russian photographer Vladimir Bogdanov. He was born in 1937 and became famous in Europe in his twenties. He was the founder of street photography in the USSR. The film shows his present life in a distant Russian village and his stories about his very interesting past.

image:image.image:title: One Night in June
image:image.image:caption: Two years ago Nadia and Yolanda were moments away from the biggest day in their lives; their wedding day. For reasons unbeknownst to Nadia, Yolanda walks out on everything they ever had never looking back. Two years later Nadia has found love again, and is emotionally blindsided to see that Yolanda has too.

image:image.image:title: Hold Your Own Flag! Red Wind at the 2nd Annual May Day Jamboree
image:image.image:caption:
Short musical film documenting the use of arts and music in activism by indie folk band Red Wind (and others who inspired them) during Asheville, NC's 2012 May Day celebration events.
Songs:
1. Go - by Neala Donovan [starts @ 3:14] 2. Hold Your Own Flag! - adapted by Neala Donovan from Shosholoza! (Go Forward!) - traditional Ndebele / Zulu / writer unknown [6:55] 3. Chuir iad Mise (They Sent Me to an Island by Myself) - traditional Scottish lullaby [10:44] 4. Mother's Dagger - by Neala Donovan [14:06] 5. The Foggy Dew - by Canon Charles O'Neill [20:04] 6. Hold Your Own Flag! Reprise [26:20]

image:image.image:title: Elisa Esteve Aqui
image:image.image:caption: Você já ouviu falar sobre a loira do banheiro. Talvez, até conheça alguém que já a tenha visto. Mas há algo sobre ela que ninguém sabe. O filme Elisa Esteve Aqui traz a lenda urbana em uma perspectiva jamais vista. Cada minuto assistido nos leva a vivenciar o terror e os brutais sentimentos existentes, tanto nas histórias, como dentro de cada ser humano. Afinal, não haverá um quê de veracidade em cada conto?

image:image.image:title: Have We Met?...the interlude
image:image.image:caption: After a day out on the town on a surprising nice day in the Great Lakes city of Buffalo, NY... Loyal has seen her wife, or so she thinks... Until a chance meeting on the subway train leads her to ask the question... Have We Met?

image:image.image:title: Requiem

image:image.image:title: JASKA THE KILLER III - OFFICIAL TRAILER
image:image.image:caption: Jaska the Killer is back, in this thrilling third installment in this short Spanish horror franchise. This time, the might of a combined international police task-force and the will of one lone female detective, Alba, who is desperate to avenge her dead partner, might be enough to end Jaska's demonic reign of terror. But the real question is, as the noose tightens on the Joker calling card murderer, is this the end or a new beginning? And what price will Alba have to pay for revenge?...

image:image.image:title: trailer for 'The Goodbye Girl'
image:image.image:caption: This is a trailer for the latest film I've written, directed and produced. Over 100 people worked on this film, with a six year old girl playing the title role... Warning, contains brief clips of a sexual nature...

image:image.image:caption: Ajet Ferizi, a worker of mines. This documentary is an observe documentary, without voice over and no pre set-up interview. Hardships, desires to work in a mining, communicating with his colleagues and family.

image:image.image:title: Home Body
image:image.image:caption: A young girl falls asleep and dreams of a young girl. Over the course of several dreams they fall in love with each other, but she learns that dreams are not reality.

image:image.image:title: fences (no walls)
image:image.image:caption: I was fooling around with iPhone’s panoramic feature when I noticed the way it broke up the patterns in a chain link fence. At the time, fences were going up in Europe in an effort to control the heavy human migrations coming from the Middle East and Africa. The use of the fence as a motif had already played a part in the art that I have created, and so I thought that maybe I should expand upon the discovery of this glitch. After stitching together a number of fence panoramas that were found in my neighborhood, I used the resulting pan as a type of score from which the electronic soundtrack was composed.

image:image.image:title: Positive
image:image.image:caption: A young couple struggles to keep their relationship together, but they each have secrets. Will those secrets tear them apart?

image:image.image:title: Welcome to Valhalla
image:image.image:caption: Welcome to Valhalla was a promotional video developed for the Berry Vikings' first home game in their new home: Valhalla Stadium. It was produced over a period of 2 weeks with a $0 budget and minimal crew. Regardless of the lack of budget and production time, it has been nominated for 3 regional awards, including a Southeastern Emmy.

image:image.image:title: DESTINATION POINT

They have received a mysterious message from Kerem's girl friend ?ule and ?ule's cousin Erdal who they are waiting for them in the camp. Kerem, are not even aware of his destiny will change today in campsite... While ?ule chasing something, they are in a point that they really don't want...

image:image.image:title: Save Yourself - Thriller - Short movie - A film by Erik Blanc
image:image.image:caption:
Gabriel is a young Autistic, his sister Emma decides to go for the weekend with her fiancé Lance Germany. After several hours of driving, sometimes on the premises of the camp in front of a beautiful lake. Gabriel will run away with a stranger on the first night ...
Lance and Emma live a hell on earth ... while Gabriel will have to make a choice ...

image:image.image:title: Toe, Petal, Cosmos
image:image.image:caption: This short film generally describes a transformable relationship within our little dusty world. I create this project based on " Quantum Theory" which describes that one object could exist at the same time in different parts of this world in any unexpected form. This beautiful theory stimulate me to visualize my feeling about this idea.

image:image.image:title: Dystopia Rooms
image:image.image:caption: Dystopia Room combines four claymation. The concept is about mental disorders. I assume this character is absolutely isolated. It share the exact emotional response as every human beings. I put it in four different sets of environment. And I try to explore the relationship of this room the reaction of this character.

image:image.image:title: ALWAYS
image:image.image:caption: "We grow and live on the same branch, fight happens at any time, however, I will always forgive you no matter what." Relationships is the main inspiration of this piece.

image:image.image:title: MASKED
image:image.image:caption: People ridden with anxiety and depression often have a hard time telling those closest to them that something is wrong. You begin to put up a wall and create these unrealistic situations in your head that cause the anxiety to rise even more. Sometimes it's okay to admit that you're not okay.

"Matt reprend la route aux cotés de Katana et Lolie... Il redevient le Challenger pour régler une vieille affaire. Son pire ennemi, le Capitaine, sort lui aussi de l'ombre... Le duel est proche." Pour mener à bien sa Mission le Challenger doit d'abord passer récupérer un objet indispensable chez les moniales, mais tout ne va pas se passer comme prévu...
"Matt reprend la route aux cotés de Katana et Lolie... Il redevient le Challenger pour régler une vieille affaire. Son pire ennemi, le Capitaine, sort lui aussi de l'ombre... Le duel est proche."

image:image.image:title: LOVE IN THE ELEVATOR
image:image.image:caption: This is a story of love and acceptance and learning to trust again regardless of our cultural stereotypes. I wanted to showcase young emerging talent from diverse cultural backgrounds working together on the same goal and realizing that they have so much in common.

image:image.image:title: Medical Life: "The Cursed Gift."
image:image.image:caption:
This short film has been awarded "Best Short film" at "Connaissance- The Short Film Festival" at CONFLUENCE 2016- held at Seth GS Medical College and KEM Hospital- Mumbai.
This short film portrays the life of health professionals of all sectors, from Medical, surgical to rehabilitation and nursing. It involves the life of these professionals away from their normal hospital routine and showcases their actual role as a particular professional.
Here we have interviewees who are doctors and are into various other professions following their field of interest. They mentioned their role in the normal society and how crucial their role is in the entire community.
Music credits: Essel Vision and Zee Talkies- "Fandry" (title theme" and "love theme") Marvel Studios: X-Men-Apocalypse (End Credits track)
@TubewireInc would like to thank the following people for their support: Dr. Smrati Bajpai Dr. Lopa Mehta Ishani Chaudhary Harshad Ramineni Shreyas Yakkali Saransh Vakharia Vipul Jajoo
A @TubewireInc Production along with the students of Seth GS Medical College and KEM hospital, Mumbai.
Hail Victory!!!

image:image.image:title: Blood For Dracula
image:image.image:caption: Dracula finds an alternative means to satisfy his lust for blood

image:image.image:title: To Breathe Sulfur
image:image.image:caption:
The story begins with four characters wearing strange masks. They walk through a landscape surrounded by dead animal bones. After some time everything changes from black and white into colorful magical night. The main inspiration of this animation were shamanic drawings and primitive rituals.
"To Breathe Sulfur" is Official Music Video for the Slovak band ?isté Tvary.

image:image.image:title: It Always Trembles
image:image.image:caption: On the morning of the 30th anniversary of Mexico's 1985 earthquake, a man follows his daily routine, while we listen to a disturbing phone call he has with his very much loved mother.

image:image.image:title: Paper Plane
image:image.image:caption: A story about a boy who comes to the park where he and his father used to play at starts to reminisce their time together making paper planes, remembering the lessons his father left him.

image:image.image:title: As Dreams Go By - Trailer
image:image.image:caption: These are four loosely connected episodes about loneliness and the plight of ageing in London. A widower observing life from his balcony; an Italian widow feeding the birds in a park; an eccentric loner with a passion for collecting coins, and a caring husband attending his bedridden wife. These snippets of apparently non-meaningful lives are constructed with the intend to highlight that each random passerby is living a life as vivid and complex as our own.
image:image.image:geo_location: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

image:image.image:title: Treasure on Caldey Island
image:image.image:caption: A man finds a treasure map and sets off to change his life.....but not all is what it seems. Part musical, part thriller, all action!!
image:image.image:geo_location: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

image:image.image:title: The land of my art
image:image.image:caption: The eastern Democratic Republic of Congo long considered a red zone, is full of artistic potential and cultural values so deafened by the sound of bursting bombs and crackling balls. In this murderous music over 20 years, films, poems, songs, dance, drawing, and other forms of art are constantly denouncing the wealth of this region as the basic of all these wars repeating in this Congolese region and these wars are supported financially and materially by western countries but a part from that, the African culture came out victorious in resistant to these wars.

image:image.image:title: Idiotas
image:image.image:caption: A red balloon descends from sky and lands in the magic city of Santiago de Compostela (famous for the Jacobeo's pilgrimage). A smiling boy and his dog find the balloon and discover that it hangs a paper with a message: "Deflate me little by litte..."

Published on Mar 18, 2015
Dare you look at your other side? When Neil meets Heather it is love at first sight... They enjoy a whirlwind romance and revel in how happy they are... Until they run into Machlis... Parallel is an erotic and chilling psychological drama with a distinctly new approach and a killer twist!

image:image.image:title: Chance
image:image.image:caption: Chance tells the story of a grieving husband who recounts the last three days he spent with his wife. In doing so, he explores the relationship between time and probability and creates an unrealistic world in which he believes he is at fault for her death.

image:image.image:title: Carmesí
image:image.image:caption:
Synopsis: A woman seduces men to bring them to her house to murder them, cut their genitals and eats them to please herself.
Sinopsis: Una mujer seduce hombres para llevarlos a su casa, asesinarlos y comerse sus genitales hasta satisfacer sus necesidades sexuales.
Sinopsis Larga: Una mujer de clase alta asiste a bares en búsqueda de un perfil específico de hombres. Los que lleva a su departamento, mediante un juego erótico los manipula y consigue asfixiarlo con el objetivo de devorar su pene en un acto ceremonial para lograr alcanzar el máximo placer sexual.

image:image.image:caption: A short story about uncontrolled anger and overcoming this through discipline.

image:image.image:title: Along The Edge Of The Sea - Sul Confine del Mare
image:image.image:caption: What’s Poetry? Is it perhaps the recollection of past things which are still alive in other allegorical places? Does Poetry hide herself behind an obscure message? Mostly, Life creates Poetry; Life intended as the epiphany that bring us along the line of a border as uncertain as the edge of the Sea. Poetry is a solitaire and reluctant figure, but when the spark of an idea lights up our feelings, she is ready to follow us. Without a research we can only wait, ready to understand that Life is everything and Poetry is in everything.

image:image.image:title: On Edge - A Fior di Pelle
image:image.image:caption: A tense blade splits the tale: on the one hand, a man rejected once again is shocked by a sudden sick idea; on the other hand, a couple spend some time together. Then the encounter. The last.

image:image.image:title: Scratches
image:image.image:caption: Panayotis pays a visit to his parents. The family chit chat evolves in to somehting very differnt than the usual unclouded talks. This time is for reckoning.

image:image.image:title: Bite Club
image:image.image:caption: A young werewolf named Adron goes looking for his older brother Haydon, who has been missing for some time. He begins his search at the last place Haydon was seen. The elusive venue for supernaturals called Bite Club. The place where the 'supes' can be themselves and away from the humans. Adron gets thrown into a world where the vampires and werewolves are still battling a war with the humans, and discovers that the vamps and the weres are not the only 'supes' out there. Please note: During post production we lost two of our precious actors to suicide. Our thoughts are with their famiIies and loved ones. We will always have them in our hearts and now they are immortalized in film. R.I.P

"Change” is the law of the universe. In this materialistic world, individuals with all their intellect and power of analysing, consciously value outer appearance(the fake reality) over inner soul(the ultimate reality)

image:image.image:title: Happily Never After
image:image.image:caption: The story of a young girl as she ventures through the Grimm land of Fairytales, but not all stories have a happy ending...
image:image.image:geo_location: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

image:image.image:title: HOME IS WHERE MY AGE IS
image:image.image:caption: Three life backgrounds and three different ways of thinking related to one story. This film shows how entirely different people: a poet, a former headmistress of the home for elderly people and a married couple end up in the same place, in one Home for elderly people, where they are doomed to wait for their death. This documentary scratches under the dull surface of third age people, reveals their specific personalities by showing their everyday lives and it gives them the opportunity to be themselves and not just old.

image:image.image:title: Surrender
image:image.image:caption:
An alcoholic struggles to get through the day in a surreal and frightening world where his inner demons appear real. Haunted by his worst fears, his sanity starts to slip, as does what little control he has left over his addiction.
Surrender is a short independent film about a functioning alcoholic who takes a trip down Jacob's Ladder to a nightmare Neverland as he hits rock bottom.

image:image.image:title: No More Tomorrows
image:image.image:caption: A self-centered young woman on a family road trip encounters two strangers who are far more dangerous than they appear. As fate intervenes, she has to find the courage to learn to live for today if her family have any chance to see another tomorrow.

image:image.image:title: INK (4K Visual Experiment)
image:image.image:caption: [[WARNING: CONTAINS FLASHING IMAGES]] The second video in a series of visual experiments carried out in our studio, INK explores the explosive nature or dropping metallic ink on to a water laced surface. First in the series; Colour, is available to watch here (vimeo.com/168358856) Music: The Invisible Wave by Young Collective Programmes Used: Premiere Pro CC After Effects CC Photoshop CC Filmed Using: Black Magic Design URSA 50mm Canon Cine Prime Lens Selection of Arri lights Directors: Alex Stockley & Lewis Rees Editor: Lewis Rees Produced by Lapse Film Limited LapseFilm.com Info@lapsefilm.com

image:image.image:title: Two Broken Windows
image:image.image:caption: Two Broken Windows is a short documentary about the September 11th attacks in New York City in 2001. It focusses on the audio recordings taken from the emergency calls made on the morning by people trapped inside the two buildings. These recordings are set over ambient and time-lapse cinematography of New York City.

image:image.image:title: Yumington No Bodies
image:image.image:caption: A mysterious man offers to men and women to make another choice they made at an important time in their lives. What new decisions will they take? What will be the consequences? And especially what will be the price to pay? Halfway between reality and hallucinations, Yumington No Bodies makes you dive into the choices of ordinary people and into the strange story of this manipulator witch begins in the XVIII century.

image:image.image:title: Rock Star
image:image.image:caption: A bar, a Rock Star, a concert.

image:image.image:title: Hijas (Daugthers)
image:image.image:caption: Two daughters talk about the death of his father.

image:image.image:title: Cut-Off
image:image.image:caption: Daisy lost her eyesight and her father in a car accident. She and her mother Bridget now must struggle with their grief, and learn to adapt with their lives turned upside down.

image:image.image:title: Rebecka, portrait of a mother
image:image.image:caption: Rebecka suffers from Postpartum depression and can’t bond with her daughter. She finds an unconventional solution to the situation, but this is suddenly taken away from her. The sandcastle, upon which she has constructed her newfound happiness, falls. Now she finds herself heading in a new direction.

image:image.image:title: The Silent man who has a pink heart
image:image.image:caption: Le Minh Hoang who is a victim of gender discrimination living in Sai Gon, Viet Nam. No family, no friends, no job and discrimination of society, these things push him down with no way out. He decides to remove himself from life by committing suicide from hanging on the flyover. Fortunately, he is rescued successfully. After being given a new opportunity to live, he makes himself must live with positive lifestyle, forget his past and never let that happens again. “You have to overcome your bravery to be survived in your life”.

image:image.image:title: Insomnia
image:image.image:caption:
A man with a sleep disorder drives his car through the night. After crossing paths with a woman in danger, he's dragged into a dangerous underworld.
Insomnia is about a lonesome and isolated man who suffers from a sleeping disorder. Instead of staying at home brooding, he copes with his situation by driving aimlessly trough the night.
We want to create a film that causes a visceral reaction in the spectator while at the same time being entertaining. We feel that’s the best type of experience, one that changes you, that penetrates your subjectivity.
Our film can be described as a thriller with some neo-noir elements and an arthouse aesthetic. Drive, Only God Forgives and Under the Skin count as some of our inspirations. We want the film to be minimalist in it´s approach and we intend on letting the images speak for themselves.
Insonia features Nuno Pardal, Mafalda Lencastre and Diogo Lima.

image:image.image:title: Solfeggietto
image:image.image:caption: "Solfeggietto" is a sad story of one "Facebook Profile's" "virtual" life.The animated film is reflection of transformed modern human relationships that have recently become big part of a seemingly simple,fast and user-friendly social networks.

image:image.image:title: SACRÉ COEUR
image:image.image:caption: Sami young newspaper distributor , the dreamy temperament , teaches sign language to communicate with a young deaf and mute girl he meets every morning at its distribution of newspapers . One morning , she dropped her scarf to restore its good but the subway doors close violently . From there , Sami then starts a run, a pitfall strewn with mad race begins to catch the "angel " to the next station .

image:image.image:title: Verochka
image:image.image:caption: The little girl wants to go to India. But her family is very poor. Once she finds out that her neighbor is going to go to the country of her dreams. What will do the little girl to realize her dream?

image:image.image:title: Aayushy Kharach Khup Sundar Aahe
image:image.image:caption: ‘Ramesh’ is HIV a patient. His wife ‘Vijaya’ got infected by Ramesh himself and died two and half years ago. Ramesh believes that his wife vijaya is still living with him as a soul. She came out of photo frame and disappears when somebody comes. Ramesh has only one son ‘sanju’ who moves to another place with his wife n daughter in fear of AIDS. Ramesh is tired of loneliness and decide to commit suicide. On other side ‘Sharu’ is a school girl, loving daughter of Mr n Mrs mahajan. She has a grandfather ‘Baba’ who has paralysis. Sharu don’t like him. They have a maid ‘Dolly’. she and her boyfriend ‘Vicky’ steal jewelry and sharu caught them. So Vicky wants to kill her. Both stories run simultaneously and not connected till interval. Ramesh want to talk to someone before dying and he dials randomly. His call gets to sharu’s home. Here, both stories connect each other. Dolly n Vicky gives phone to sharu. Ramesh try to express his sorrow but sharu don’t listen and try to inform her situation. She talks about Computer Virus and 007 etc. Ramesh disconnect phone with anger and drinks poison. After some time ramesh realizes that there is a woman or a girl in major problem and need his help. What could he do when he is going to die? Is he able to save her? Few moments of life are so precious! Every moment of life has its own purpose. Film ends with this massage.

image:image.image:title: The abandoned faces
image:image.image:caption: People with no faces, emigrating to a land to take new identity and face to stay and alive.

image:image.image:title: Roof Party
image:image.image:caption: A calm night in the city 2 old friends meet. On a rooftop under the stars, hours before her life will change forever she questions herself through him.

image:image.image:title: Huramentado (Oath to Die)
image:image.image:caption:
Northern Samar is one of the poorest provinces in the Philippines. Politicians here are elected into office by means of vote-buying. Most of them are based in Manila and they only come here during election time. They treat the province like it’s their hacienda.
Some residents work as bodyguards and gunmen for politicians. For a small amount, they can be hired to gun down political rivals.
Michael and Jess both hail from this province. Two different people whose lives are changed forever by seemingly identical events in their past.
How should a man come to terms with the tragedies in his life? What does one do when faced with the adversary that hinders him from moving forward? Michael and Jess answer these questions and their stories are juxtaposed in this tale about vengeance and loss of innocence.

image:image.image:title: Dear Tom
image:image.image:geo_location: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

image:image.image:title: THE DAY OF THE BLEEDING GUMS
Singalila in the Himalaya
image:image.image:caption:
Published on Sep 1, 2016 Singalila La In the Himalaya : The film is a Journey through the Sikkim and Nepal Himalayas: 14 day trek along the Singali la ridge, overlooking the views of Mount Kangchenjunga and Mount Everest.
With ten porters, two guides and a cook, the team of three: George, Alexa and Blanchet starts their epic trek from Yuksam in West Sikkim.
The team head north to Goecha La Pass to see early morning views of Mount Khangchenjunga and, then head west to the border of Nepal or the Singalila Ridge.
From there they head south along the Singali La ridge to see Mount Everest and Mount Khangchenjunga.
On the 13th day, the team reach a remote village at the border of India and Nepal, inhibited by a nomadic yak herder. The film was shot using camera powered by custom made solar chargers, as there was no power facility during the entire trek.
George was affected by Keratoconus, a rare eye disorder which decreases the thickness of cornea and results in a distorted vision, during his childhood. During his teenage years, he lost all his hopes about life as this took him away from what he wanted to do in his life and what he dreamed. George finds that traveling is one of the best medicines for his eyes and end up trekking in the Himalayas to find solace and tranquility.

image:image.image:title: Dead Hunt - Trailer Thriller A film by Erik Blanc
image:image.image:caption: A hunting man, a young couple spend a romantic holiday . Local children come to interrupt their little vacation. The two fathers of these children will head a marvel without the lam from the couple.

image:image.image:title: MOMENTS OF ENLIGHTENMENT
image:image.image:caption: After discovering her immigrant friend (Elly) is HIV positive, Kate, an international student, decides to prevent Elly from being drowned into emotional isolation. During the process of supporting her friend, she finds out some other reasons behind of Elly’s self-isolated condition, what causes Kate to review her own life values and the state of mind.

image:image.image:caption: Short film about an elderly man who sets off on a journey to find his first love and apologize for past mistakes.

image:image.image:caption: Four ordinary street-guys earn living by shouting in no-matter-what political rallies. One day, a blast happens during a rally. One of them doesn't return.

image:image.image:title: Charming (Sunless)

image:image.image:title: Need the Green
image:image.image:caption: "Need the Green" song comes from "Contro" soundtrack. "Contro" is an indipendent feature film about spies. Both the feature film and its soundtrack have been entirely created and produced by RdM Company. "Need the Green" music video is composed by film scenes along with other scenes where RdM Company members execute the song in a mysterious location,

image:image.image:title: Freedom of Childhood (Bachpan Ki Azadi)
image:image.image:caption: This story about a boy , he is a victim of child trafficking. He also has a dream to go to school, he wants to study, wants to be a good person in this life though he is belonging from a corrupted background, he is not authorized to do this.. One day he collect all his courage to ran away from that dirty environment. Somehow he succeed to do so.

image:image.image:title: IT'S Been a While
image:image.image:caption: The song "It's Been A While" talks about the myriad of misunderstandings that are caused by the lack of communication in modern relationships, whether of lovers, friends or family. Our lives are so fast faced that we fail to express our true emotions and hence may lose out on something that could've been. The song is about a girl who wonders whether her former friend/lover at all thinks about her, remembers her because he never kept in touch in spite of various promises. It's been a long time but she still wonders the meaning of that friendship.

Achievements And Awards: Official Selection At - *Golden Sun International Short film festival, Malta" *Fan Boyfilm festival *Ekurhuleni International Film Festival *TIF Video challenge *Light India International film festival, category - Short film corner *Semifinalist on " International Open Film Festival"

image:image.image:title: DON'T LOOK AT THE MIRROR
image:image.image:caption: ''Don't look at the mirror'' is a short film that debuted in 2016, written and directed by Priscilla Grijalva and stars Lucero Fernández, Arnett Marcial, Clara Peralta and Ana Pratt. This short film is based on Japanes theology and static rituals. Julia (Lucero Fernández), Linda (Clara Peralta) and Cecilia (Ana Pratt) are three friends that reunite after a long period of time to catch up on old times. Cecilia talks about strange event that happened in her house, generating intrigue in Julia. At that moment Linda tells an old Japanese legend about a demon named Emma (Arnett Marcial) and the ritual to invoke it. Emma is the king of the hells in Japanese Buddhism, in charge of judging sinners souls and casting punishment accordingly, depending on how much evil they committed on earth. Even tough Cecilia did not feel afraid, the environment began to change, Linda took it as a joke but in Julia the situation was not the same, the fear and curiosity invade her body and when she goes to the rest-room to wash her hands, she makes the decision to do the ritual thinking that maybe it will just be silly.. or thats what she thought.

image:image.image:title: Brazen Bull
image:image.image:caption: This film is about dealing with prison experience and understanding the contemporary human being's condition. The script was written based on the letters of some political prisoners , and was given to the actors , so that through these text they'd put themselves in the person's place. The actors have acted in real places, related to their personal lives but in a situation like prison and interrogation so that they could comprehend and express their nowadays situation. This way the film relates everyday life and living conditions' in prison condition.

image:image.image:title: So Much Water

An outraged teacher takes matter in his own hands and decides to bring punishment over all the class as a result of an incident that everyone thought it was funny. When everyone was expecting for hell to break loose, one stands up because he loves them.

image:image.image:title: Passover
image:image.image:caption: A man who is going to leave the country, has got stuck in a heavy traffic. He wants to give a package that he's carrying to someone, before leaving.

image:image.image:title: J...
image:image.image:caption:
When a young man wants to take life in his own hands everything goes wrong until he meets J.
Tagline: Will Change You
