image:image.image:title: It's Lurking
image:image.image:caption:
It's Lurking is the second horror film from Brian Gerson & Joseph R. Davis.
A college student comes home to find his parents are out. On the night of the super blood moon, a portal opens releasing shadow creatures that are hungry for souls.
Stay out of the shadows.

image:image.image:title: Shadows On The Ceiling
image:image.image:caption:
OFFICIAL SELECTION 2015 Laughlin International Film Festival OFFICIAL SELECTION 2015 Jerome 89A Indie Film & Music Festival OFFICIAL SELECTION & NOMINEE "Best Music Video" 2015 July Los Angeles Independent Film Festival OFFICIAL SELECTION & WINNER "Best Music Video" 2015 Global Independent Film Awards OFFICIAL SELECTION 2015 FilmQuest Film Festival OFFICIAL SELECTION 2015 Las Vegas Lift-Off Film Festival OFFICIAL SELECTION 2015 Vegas Indie Film Festival OFFICIAL SELECTION 2015 Nevada Women's Film Festival
In the third music video off of award-winning composer David Rosen’s second album An Unseen Sky, “Shadows on the Ceiling” tells the story of a little girl whose imagination is set off by shadows in her room. She runs off into a dream world to escape the darkness until she can be sure she can return safely to her bed.
The video comes from an idea by director A.R. Kagan who is also the mother of Alexa Jade Kagan, the star of the video. The music and story go together perfectly to create a beautiful picture of childhood imagination.
Directed & Shot by A.R. Kagan Edited by A.R. Kagan and David Rosen Music by David Rosen
An Unseen Sky is available for pre-order now at http://davidrosen.bandcamp.com with a full release to follow on all digital music stores by April 7th, 2015!
http://www.bydavidrosen.com

image:image.image:title: Kaithi - the Prisoner
image:image.image:caption: KAITHI visually brings you to a world of hidden emotions, where the hero falls in love with a woman who's already taken by an another man. He has become a prisoner of both that woman's mysterious beauty and his own feelings. But he recognizes his mistake thanks to the advices of a well wisher.

image:image.image:title: All About My Pregnancy
image:image.image:caption: Maya, a midwife (25 years) accompanying the journey of Susilawati Pregnancy (35 years) who traumatized after gave birth to two children by Caesarean section and wants the give birth normally. According to medical science content, gave birth normally after multiple Caesarean section can not be performed because of a risk of uterine rupture and causes of maternal mortality. Susilawati make every effort and ways to give birth normally although without support from hospitals and doctors. Other side, Maya dilemma because if She attending Susilawati to give birth, it can violate operational standard procedures of obstetrics Medical in Indonesia.

image:image.image:title: God is Dead

Visit http://tribbletoys.com/ for all of your Tribble needs. Just remember to have your Tribble spayed or neutered.

image:image.image:title: Bangkok
image:image.image:caption: A collection of video clips from Bangkok edited together to make one awesome video.

image:image.image:title: Pleasant Events
image:image.image:caption: Brenda Bleasant is “back, baby!” and boldly taking the Yucaipa, California market by storm. And, by storm, we mean a slight drizzle. Brenda’s break from the business has left her aesthetic somewhere in the 90s. Unaware of the modern world or her dated style, she teases her giant bangs and prepares for her big, bedazzled comeback. But, once she returns, she finds the whole “wedding biz” has changed. Luckily, her niece, sweet and more style-savvy Penny, is in need of an internship to complete her event planning certificate — the perfect fit. Or, is it? When Penny steps into Brenda’s pink and purple satin-covered office, she begins to question her decision. As Penny bears witness to her aunt’s outlandish ways, Penny is determined to turn the beat around. But, can she do it?

image:image.image:title: The Purple Orchid
image:image.image:caption:
Un hogar ocupado por una joven familia humilde, es heredado al Padre Víctor. Bajo presión de sus familiares, se cuestiona así mismo enfrentando a sus propios demonios… ¿Debe actuar por conveniencia o actuar por convicción?
A home occupied by a young poor family, he inherited the Father Victor. Under pressure from his family, he is thus facing the same challenges his own demons ... It must act for convenience or act out of conviction?

image:image.image:title: The Gatekeeper
image:image.image:caption:
A woman searching for her brother finds more than she bargained for when a Rothchilde demon introduces her to the Netherrealm.
This project was made a number of years ago by a bunch of us Columbia College Hollywood grads.
It was primarily shot on 35mm with the end green screen footage on DV. The wind was so bad at the Lancaster shooting location that all of the dialogue and sounds had to be recreated in post.
"The Gatekeeper" stars Mary L. Carter and Clint Glenn Hummel.

image:image.image:caption: A Story Which has The Stories But One Climax

image:image.image:title: HIM+HER
image:image.image:caption:
HIM+HER is a dramatic short film about the beginning and ending of a relationship, told from the perspective of both characters.
Directed by Mike Reda, with powerful performances by Courtney Lynn Lakin and Christopher Robert Escobar, HIM+HER is a touching, hopeful and relatable story about love and loss, and what could happen if we just take a chance and hope.
Starring Courtney Lynn Lakin, Christopher Robert Escobar and Trey Horton

image:image.image:caption: This cartoon is about a earthworm who is death and wishes to hear sound. It's not until it comes across a bell that it's wish comes true.

image:image.image:caption: A family lives in woods alone. Three sisters of this family cannot speak well. This film tries to find the reason.

image:image.image:caption: A motley crew of vegetables make a daring attempt to reach the safety of the fridge before decomposing altogether. Who will survive - and what will be left of them?
image:image.image:geo_location: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

image:image.image:title: The Culprit - Trailer
image:image.image:caption: A Psychological thriller where a man is trying to search his wife after admitting of killing her.

image:image.image:title: There is hope greater than love?
image:image.image:caption: José Bento is a farmer who lives in a site. He keeps with him a great love story and, after receiving a letter, has rekindled the flame of hope.

image:image.image:title: The Inevitable
image:image.image:caption: Sebastian Willard has been diagnosed with a terminal disease. Facing his demise he must decide who to tell and what kind of legacy he wants to leave behind. His last ditch effort to make a difference in the lives of old and new friends, present and past loves.

image:image.image:title: I will wait for you on the other side
image:image.image:caption:
Synopsis
A man go to his work very early in the morning as he does every day, the careless behavior of the drivers (including himself) leads him into an accident. During his agony he begged for help to the people staring at him, but only a male nurse who was passing by wanted to help him but at the very last minute changed his mind and stole his watch.
The dying man still conscious of what´s is happening around him is not able to move, but with his last strength says to the male nurse: "I will be waiting for you on the other side".
Since that moment the male nurse started to face many paranormal events, all of them related to the spirit of the dead man, chasing him to insanity and desperation looking for revenge and making him to face the same fate!

image:image.image:title: The Process
image:image.image:caption: The College Application process is a stressful time in many student's lives. Told through 4 different chapters, The Process follows three high-school seniors as they apply to their dream colleges. They have worked so hard, but will they succeed?

image:image.image:title: Wannabe
image:image.image:caption: Directed by 17 year old filmmaker Alexander Edep, Wannabe tells the story of High School Student Peter Anderson (Stevie Hopkins) becomes vigilante superhero “Wannabe” in order to combat the rising tide of crime in his community. Accompanied by best friend Mitchell (Tommy Sullivan) and girlfriend Katie (Kyra Aguilera), Peter endures great challenges and changes in both his community and personal life.

image:image.image:title: until the day when...
image:image.image:caption: A man and a woman are in a car. They seem nervous and lost, we can feel the tension rising between them along with the kilometres. All of a sudden the woman realizes that something is missing at the back seat. Will they manage to find what they have lost in time?

image:image.image:title: expired
image:image.image:caption: A policeman, a belly dancer, a white rabbit, a secret agent, a man hopelessly in love: the cast of characters in Islam Kamal’s hyperactive comedy Expired is sourced directly from the tropes of Egypt’s film history of the last thirty years. The film places its protagonists in stereotypical situations, ranging from courting to interrogations, using satire and humor as a vehicle for sociological-political commentary, A manifesto of sorts from the young, independent film scene in Egypt.

image:image.image:title: After The Blitz
image:image.image:caption: "After The Blitz" is the story of a young girl living in London during the Blitz attacks of WWII and her reaction to her changing world.

image:image.image:title: Eastern Indochina - Documenting a Journey
image:image.image:caption: For centuries the south-western part of Asia was filled with an array of small kingdoms that remained under the reign of powerful China. Today's Vietnam, Laos, Cambodia and Thailand share their cultural roots that have their basis in common history, religion and similar social conditions. Despite the existence of borders, the countries of Indochina are inhabited to a great extent by the same ethnic groups that have matured culturally in similar economic and political circumstances. The ancient and modern history have linked the inhabitants of the region into a cultural unity. We first came to South-East Asia in 2008. We travelled across Thailand, Burma and Cambodia and made a promise to ourselves to return to Indochina again. For this reason we made a journey to Vietnam and Laos in 2014 and visited also the northern part of Thailand. This film was made during that particular journey - a travelogue describing our voyage across Eastern Indochina.

image:image.image:title: The Robert Yummy Sandifer Story
image:image.image:caption: The Robert “Yummy” Sandifer Story is part 1 of 12 a current production series Chicago Chronicles.In 1994 Time Magazine covered the story about a 11 year old child (gang member) who is coerced by older gang members into committing felonious crimes and supposedly murder. Yummy is then killed by the older gang members in order to silence him before the authorities could find out who sent 'Yummy' on those murder missions. The story lines used in the movie are based on true events.Nicknamed Yummy because of his love of junk food, Sandifer was a young member of the street gang the Black Disciples. After committing murder, arson and armed robbery, he was executed by fellow gang members Cragg and Derrick Hardaway.Yummy is presented in this film as a ghost who haunts the son of Cragg Hardaway (Cragg Jr) an reveals secrets about his life an murder to Cragg Jr through his dreams.He warns Cragg Jr as he reveals stories of his life and others in the "Chicago Chronicles" series.

image:image.image:title: Are We Them Yet ? Trailer
image:image.image:caption:
Birth, Brotherhood and Bumpin' Uglies in the Backseat.
drop me a line at kavxoxo180@yahoo.com to see the full film !

image:image.image:title: Citizen 'Caine
image:image.image:caption: A cocaine-addicted insurance salesman searches LA for his missing teenage daughter. He confronts the cast and crew of a Hollywood studio that makes adult films which also function as home maintenance training videos.

image:image.image:title: The Power of Dream
image:image.image:caption: an inspiring football documentary that is about more than just football.

image:image.image:title: Aquaphobia
image:image.image:caption: Sitting on the edge of a swimming pool, while gathers courage to enter the water, the filmmaker reflects on his others fears and frustrations.

image:image.image:title: Wings (Dana)
image:image.image:caption: The story of two strangers who meet one day on their way to work. They share a conversation about their lives and then part ways to their work. But some things are not exactly same.

image:image.image:title: "Psychos" trailer
image:image.image:caption: Russia, Moscow, our days. Two young men, adhering to no unambiguously expressed civic stand, consider themselves fascists. Influenced by the environment and fascinated by the pseudo-appeal of external attributes, they remain unaware of how far all of it may lead to. A leader of the organization commits murder which the main characters are later on accused of. The situation is complicated by the fact that the protagonist falls in love with a girl belonging to the movement ANTIFA. In attempt to prove their innocence both guys face manifestations of the real fascism, and the latter turns out to completely contradict their real beliefs and internal principles. The movie shows that fascism is alien to any normal person and healthy society, regardless of the country, nationality and social status in question.

image:image.image:title: Remembering the Twin Towers
image:image.image:caption: This is a 30 second tribute to the Twin Towers.

image:image.image:title: on the edge of the road
image:image.image:caption: Two young people, Paul and Arthur, are on the road. The are not speaking to each other. Paul desperately tries to catch Arthur's attention, but Arthur is seated on his bench and doesn't move, too focused in playing at his video game. Paul pretends to leave but comes back to Arthur. Will he manage to instore communication with him ?

image:image.image:title: WASTE
image:image.image:caption: ¿Alguna vez se han preguntado dónde van a parar la gran cantidad de residuos que generamos todos los días? ¿Sabían que todos los días cada una de las personas que vive en la Ciudad de Buenos Aires y en el Conurbano Bonaerense arroja un kilo de basura? En este cortometraje documental ponemos en evidencia la gran masa de basura que genera la producción y el consumo desmedido, y nosotros ¿Qué hacemos al respecto?

image:image.image:title: 'Full Stop' experimental short's trailer

To know the twist one should watch the film.

Starring - Nikola Trifunovic and Ava West Lindy Pieri Rima Farah Ramez Farah Jesse Burland 1st AC/ Camera Operator - Matt Wardas Sound - Dimitri LyubodimaWatch and find out!

image:image.image:caption: The Final Project is an independently made, short 'found footage' style horror film. Mark Bates is a Film studies student student who will stop at nothing to make the perfect horror film, even if it means killing his classmates.

image:image.image:caption:

The Dancer is about a Romanian dancer, Lumina, who befriends a German concentration camp guard, Max, to try and save her life from the evils of the camp and its cruel commanders.
The Dancer was filmed on a NikonD7000 and edited on Final Cut Pro.

The Dancer is about a Romanian dancer, Lumina, who befriends a German concentration camp guard, Max, to try and save her life from the evils of the camp and its cruel commanders.

image:image.image:title: Mele Kalikimaka
image:image.image:caption: Filmed entirely on Christmas Day in Hilo, Hawai'i.

image:image.image:title: Sundays
image:image.image:caption: A short film disguised as a music video about one man's quest for knowledge.

image:image.image:title: The last penalty (Il rigorista)
image:image.image:caption:
Included in AVIFF Cannes Art Film Festival official catalog.
Synopsis
The penalty kicker and the goalkeeper are opposite each other. The ball is positioned carefully by the penalty kicker. He’s about to kick the last penalty goal. The memories, emotions, moments and important decisions made in his life come to mind, bringing the story to an unexpected end.

image:image.image:title: Dreamcaught
image:image.image:caption:
"Dreamcaught" is a 3 min short animation by Polish animation student Natasza Cetner. It focuses on relations between seemingly accidental images we come across in our dreams or nightmares.
The visions we see in our dreams can tell us some stories with sensible plots and characters. We can replay our memories changed in a way according to our emotions or experiences. But what is the most disturbing and therefore fascinating is the chain of surprising, grotesque dark scenes that are stuck in our subconscious. For some reason they are "shown" together as one. But why? Is that because they are all some kind of interpretations of what we feel right now? What is driving us crazy or is it the projection of our most hidden fears?
The film is about those blurred connections between the pictures projected in our sleeping minds. The shots seem to be random, they change rapidly, and the plot is twisted so there is different concept of the meaning for everyone of us.
The film is kept in dark surrealistic atmosphere mostly inspired by 20th Century photography such as Andre Kertesz and Henri Cartier-Bresson with a strong influence of works written by Guillaume Apollinaire and surrealist poems by Andre Breton.
image:image.image:geo_location: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

image:image.image:title: Lupus Perditus - The forsaken Wolf
image:image.image:caption: Responsible for his wife's death, Sven escapes into the wild in order to set an end to his life. Not able to pull the trigger, he feels downcast and gets stuck between two tree trunks. Desperate and disappointed by his weakness, he finds himself in a really life-threatening situation alone in the woods. That sure is not the way he had imagined his death. Getting worse, a rustling in the bushes nearby turns out not to be a life-saver but a wild wolf. In addition to these outward dangers, Sven starts hearing a cheeky voice inside his head that is driving him mad.

image:image.image:title: Same Fruit, Different Tree
image:image.image:caption: This story follows that of an innocent sheltered youth by the name of Trey. He has a simple life and a great relationship with his mother. Yet, his entire world is rocked when he sees a video of Eric Garner getting choked to death. Shocked by this new found discovery, Trey will never be the same. This short takes a very symbolic approach to the issue of Police Brutality. Many of these symbols pay tribute to those who have wrongfully fallen before. This is not just a story of discovery, it is also a story of the aftermath of what's left behind.

image:image.image:title: Maleficium - Fantasy Film Trailer
image:image.image:caption:
Maleficium is about a young princess, named Ayla, who turns to dark magic to raise her true love back from the dead. However, Ayla will discover that dark magic cannot be trusted, and is turned into a fell witch, who is being hunted by a an evil black knight that she mistakenly raised from the dead.
MUSIC BY: http://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/music.html
NARRATION BY: Demitra Papadinis DEMITRA'S IMDB: http://www.imdb.com/name/nm4319698/
Maleficium was filmed on a NikonD7000 and edited on Final Cut Pro X.

image:image.image:title: The Policeman's Museum
image:image.image:caption: The generation of Assamese people growing up in urban environment in Assam (India), are unaware of the rural heritage and past of the Assamese people. Mr Someswar Dutta a Police officer of Assam Police Department, hailing from a rural background and now residing in Guwahati city made a small home museum in the unused first floor of his house, where he tries to show the rural heritage of Assamese people specially to the new generation.

image:image.image:title: JAY
image:image.image:caption: JAY, is one of us. Could be anyone and anywhere, in every moment of our lives. He has no face or shape. He just exists. In this short film, the references are changing through a narration (a bit poetic, perhaps!).

image:image.image:title: Jaime and Deborah's First Time (La Primera Vez de Jaime y Deborah)
image:image.image:caption:
PASSWORD: deborah .
After chatting for a few days on a website, Jaime and Deborah decide to finally meet in person, but things don't go as planned when they find out that the promises they made behind a computer are hard to keep and they face an unexpected obstacle: human instincts.

image:image.image:title: Pollo Asado (Roasted Chicken)

Sinopsis: Después de un largo día, Martina se dispone a servir la cena a su marido y a su hijo. Su receta estrella: pollo asado.
Synopsis: After a long day, Martina is ready to serve dinner to her husband and son. Her star recipe: roasted chicken.

image:image.image:title: Oh my God
image:image.image:caption:
Four men are dining in a very luxurious home. They chat about holidays, dresses, love. They're all gay. Two of them are a couple after many years, another one is the former companion of one go them, and took at the dinner his new boyfriend. At the end of the night, the couple is alone in the dark: he's got to go, he's supposed to be otherwhere: it's the Christmas night.
The farewell between the couple: a little struggle of sentiments, with a great love in the words. They'll be back tighter tomorrow, but that night is longer than the others.

image:image.image:title: "Five" Trailer
image:image.image:caption: After committing a murder, a teenage boy becomes apathetic to all future emotion and events. “Five” aims to communicate a message about rejection of society’s moral and religious dogma through an experimental flashback structure and noir-inspired visuals.

image:image.image:title: Passenger Stream
image:image.image:caption: An average person spends almost a year in the metro throughout his life. We are always in a hurry to notice what is going on over there in the underground. But the life which is 60-70 meters deep requires some special watching: the watcher in the “glasses”, the people selling soft toys in the passages, the homeless, performers, the vendors of unnecessary goods in carriages- all that shapes a strange world, a ” socio-“ which exists in parallel to the down to the earth world.

image:image.image:title: Father of Jayla

image:image.image:title: Deserve

image:image.image:title: Clue No.1 (Part III from l'amante anglaise)
image:image.image:caption: This abstract film inspired by part III of l'amante anglaise by Marguerite Duras, telling a story of Claire in prison talking about her murder case.

image:image.image:title: VOID
image:image.image:caption: A strange debate of ideologies surfacing in the popular media sucks out reason and logicalities only to fill instead with confusion. Thus, rendering one's ideas, views and actions into a vague nothingness; so much so that the thought processes and the alternate realities, the dreams and the entire subconscious mind would delve into an augmented and of course distorted reality. The only way out of the oblivion, is by asking questions. One must be analytical. It's just not about the whites, the blacks or the greys anymore; everything on every plane is refracted and is further flipped and turned over into a truncated capsule of truth. It renders itself so intimidating that a woman wonders how to communicate when her language is so vague it is lost in misinterpretations and loss of emotions! The dimension of the world around her is incomprehensible, her vulnerability is ever more unsettling as she embarks on a trip to a kaleidoscopic extravaganza! What follows, is a curious story of her emancipation as she sets off: "Am I here? Am in your dream?"

image:image.image:title: T.R.A.C.E. A Doctor Who Fan Film Web Series Season 1
image:image.image:caption: When two world collide, Agent 451 was sent through dimensions to stop Agent 577 in destroying our Earth, he failed. Now he teams up with the The Doctor to stop them.

image:image.image:title: Hope
image:image.image:caption: The ‘Hope Trilogy’ intends to explore the fundamental emotions of hope and fear which are at the root of human existence. The first film is about a young girl lost in a rural area near a big park at dusk, as she is looking for shelter she hears a pulsating noise of a hammer on an anvil coming from a nearby hut. As she enters the hut a series of events give the viewer contrasting ideas about whether something dreadful has happened to her or is all just a synchronicity of multiple incongruous events, hence a deeply felt emotion of hope and fear. Images of arms floating on a nearby river increase the sense of mystery whether the girl is still alive or not and the pulsating emotions of hope and fear.
image:image.image:geo_location: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

image:image.image:title: ...and Buddha smiled trailer
image:image.image:caption:
'...and Buddha smiled !' is a Marathi short film by Maheshkumar Munjale, Randhir Naidu and Pooja Awasarmol students of Savitribai Phule Pune University's Department of Communication Studies (DCS) . Its a fictional Story trying to comment on hierarchical cast system of Maharashtra, India.
Synopsis: '...and Buddha smiled !' is a story based upon the background of strange Indian cast reality. A young boy Suraj (23) crosschecks reaction of parents by bringing the Idol of Buddha in Hindu home, to marry a girl Pradnya (21) from another cast and community.

image:image.image:title: Mother's Bond
image:image.image:caption: When Aisha's husband is convicted of being a leading member of a vicious street gang, she and her six children must confront a world of judgment in order to survive.

image:image.image:title: Populace Teaser
image:image.image:caption:
Populace is a stylish dystopian SCIFI directed by Aaron Bevan Bailey, written by Dan Horrigan, starring Jamie Piggot.
Populace follows a day in the life of John, a clone, who works for the tyrannical Populace corporation. An adroit worker in the state eugenics department, troubled by his work, and willing to put aside these feelings for the greater good. On this day he must choose between the reason he was created and the woman he loves. A decision that will change his life forever.
image:image.image:geo_location: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

image:image.image:title: IDOL
image:image.image:caption: In Lafayette,Louisiana,musician MacKenzie made to top 4 American Idol in the last edition TV-show. So being an Idol I have decided to make his portrait and show to him when he came back to Lafayette to sing in a concert for the big show American Idol this Spring,2016.

image:image.image:title: NATURAL BORN CHARACTER 2016 OFFICIAL TEASER
image:image.image:caption: When an idealist is faced with the reality that he may never achieve his life-long goal of being a successful actor, he must fight against the skepticism of those closest to him and the darkness of his own mind in order to save himself, and show the world that the show must go on.

image:image.image:title: Paraphrase
image:image.image:caption: What would a mid-aged man think about women? In this beautiful, baroque labyrinth-like castle he is passing through beautiful hallways surrounded with magical historical paintings of women who all leads him towards his destiny...

image:image.image:title: Learning To Talk
image:image.image:caption: Charlie, a London office-worker has been seeing a counsellor for over a year, without much change. A chance and clumsy meeting with a young girl in his favourite cafe, however, starts him doing the one thing he's been finding so difficult all this time - talking. imdb.com/title/tt4026868/ facebook.com/learningtotalkmovie
image:image.image:geo_location: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

image:image.image:title: Knocked Up & Fucked Up
image:image.image:caption: Johannes can't get passed Anja's past infidelity and is not convinced the baby growing inside her is his. After one of their fights, Johannes' old friend Tommy shows up; a struggeling musician with a drug problem. It doesn't take long before they both delve into a night of big ambitions and broken promises.

image:image.image:title: Kilbarrack's ode to Banksy
image:image.image:caption:
This video is a tribute to the renowned street artist "Banksy" and a request for his help to take down a fence that has isolated the children in Kilbarrack from using the last safe outdoor space to play in. Kilbarrack is an under privileged area of Dublin, which doesn't even have one playground. The only safe play area was in an unused car park at the back of a community center in KCCP, which has now been fenced off to keep the children away.
This short film addresses several existential themes about the nature of exclusion, the growing trend of dividing communities, the isolation and vilification of the poor or under privileged.
A fundamental question arises in the film and is used as a metaphor to explore why we seek to build barriers as opposed to reaching out to the less fortunate in society? Essentially, pondering what has gone wrong with our sense of community and our willingness to care for one another in society today?

image:image.image:title: Splat!
image:image.image:caption: A young artist becomes famous off of his friend's accidental painting.

image:image.image:title: Happy Endings
image:image.image:caption: Inspired by the LGBT Fans Deserve Better movement (http://lgbtfansdeservebetter.com/), this film is a much-needed happily ever after.

image:image.image:title: The Golden Rule
image:image.image:caption: A rich business executive helps a homeless man facing hard times. As karma would have it, the homeless man helps the rich man in a time of need.

image:image.image:title: Dying

image:image.image:title: Ghost Walk: The Farm Trailer
image:image.image:caption:
Official Trailer for the award-winning film "Ghost Walk: The Farm"; based on Actual Events. Also known internally as 'haunted honeymoon'. A young couple is stranded in an old farm-house they've been loaned for their honeymoon. Distribution from Continuum Motion Pictures & MCTV.
Starring John Chiara, and introducing Leya Siri.
Best Short Film - Horror Trophy, Indie Gathering International Film Festival (2012) 12 Festival "Official Selections" through January 2016. Latest: International Filmmaker Festival of World Cinema, London, UK; where it is also nominated for 3 film awards. Opening night screening at Cedar Lee Theatre, Cleveland, Ohio.
Directed and edited by Steve Olander. Also nominated for "Best Cinematography".
Notable reviews: "CHECK OUT THIS TRAILER!!! IF U LIKE THIS PROMO DAMN U ARE GOING TO GO CRAZY FOR THE SUSPENSE & THE ENDING THAT GHOST WALK HAS CONJURED UP IN THIS TERROR-IFIC SCREEN SCREAM TALE! I saw it complete--& I barely lived thru the increase in blood pressure that it gave me!" - John Carpenter, Film Historian
"The Farm is brilliant scary!" - Joe Quintanilla, Producer/Celebrity Liaison
"Pretty damn good!" - Gruesome Hertzog Podcast
"A roller coaster ride into the depths of hell." - Candy O'Donnell Radio Show
" I LOVED THE SETTING I LOVED THE OLD FARM HOUSE~ HERE IN WISCONSIN WE HAVE TONS OF OLD FARM HOUSES AND AS I WATCHED I COULD ALMOST SMELL THE ATMOSPHERE FROM THE OLD WOOD IN THE BARN TO THE RAIN " - Lynn Doornbosch

image:image.image:title: The Politician
image:image.image:caption: The politician was kidnapped. An inquisitive journalist is trying to determine by whom it was organized and what were the motives of an offender.

image:image.image:title: Ingourious Billiards
image:image.image:caption: A billiards match played by two men turns into a fierce battle when a hot girl stops to watch the game.

image:image.image:title: ONE REQUEST
image:image.image:caption: A SMALL GIRL CHILD RANDOMLY CALLING EVRY STRANGER AND ASKING GOD'S NUMBER..THE REASON BEHIND WILL SURELY MAKE YOU CRY

image:image.image:title: Behind Me (Makmum) - Trailer
image:image.image:caption: Nurul is a diligent and religious student. One night, she wake up at 2 AM and pray as usual. She felt there is someone behind her and copy her movement during praying. She thinks that someone behind her is one of her friend. At last, she realize that she's the only one who stay at the dorm. Because all of her friends are coming back to their hometown. So, who's behind her?

image:image.image:title: Yours, Mime and Ours
image:image.image:caption: A heartwarming tale of a clown father trying to understand his mime daughter. Hilarity ensues.

image:image.image:title: Spin Cycle
image:image.image:caption: An experimental animation project inside a bicycle wheel that runs the gamut of animation techniques, including line, 3D, After Effects, zoetrope and stop motion. A fun and beautiful world to ride through!

image:image.image:title: Celestial
image:image.image:caption: 'Celestial' is a short science fiction 3D animated film about a supernatural being's destructive obsession to replicate a beautiful distant star.

image:image.image:title: Fog (Teaser)
image:image.image:caption: Teaser for the upcoming movie "Fog" which seeks support and endorsements to get made in Canada: The film is to be a uniquely immersive thrill ride merging WWII events with at its core a very sensitive and emotional modern day story led by a strong female. http://www.iwitnessedimages.com/fog-in-production

image:image.image:title: Puppet
image:image.image:caption: Jamshed, a hitman and his associate, Hares rummage through the city of Dhaka to hunt down a man completely in cyan --- cyan shirt, cyan pantaloons, cyan shoes. They end up on a boat in search of an almost non-existent man as per the command of their boss over phones while their evening tea waits; Jamshed’s romance for the night waits; Hares’ urge to use a gun for the first time waits. Once or twice an impatient Hares questions the sanity of such a search to which Jamshed asks him think less and follow orders (like a puppet). Finally, Hares gets a call; his long wait to shoot comes to an end and he gets to shoot. But he is not happy; he wails tear the night apart as he was one dumb-dirty puppet.

image:image.image:title: Venus (2015)
image:image.image:caption: Venus, is an adaptation of “La Maladie de la Mort” by Marguerite Duras combined with the life of the serial killer from the 70s, Charles Sobhraj whose first known female victim was in Thailand. Charles meets the girl, who he offered for her to come over and stay with him in a hotel room. Through the sex and sensibility of a woman, he rediscovers the pain he felt in his past. Finally, he is forced to face the truth and make a decision on whether he will conform to the emotional disease he has rediscovered, or move on from it. This short has expanded to be a feature film (in the process of writing a screenplay called “Into the Thin Air”) and will be adapted from real events with names changed from the original story for copyright purposes. The challenge of the project is that there have been many movies and TV adaptations in the past but none of them look at the killer’s deep in his soul and go through a relationship with his victims.

image:image.image:title: Forever and Always
image:image.image:caption: On the morning of his birthday Bill, who was diagnosed with Alzheimer's, tries to make it through the day with his ailing wife Florence and his son Jonathan.

image:image.image:title: The Dreamer

image:image.image:title: The Stairs
image:image.image:caption: Ten-year-old boy hides on the top of the staircase as his father tells a horrific story about the holocaust and escaping being gassed to death in Nazi concentration camp. After his father passes away, the boy, now a fifty-year-old man receives a cassette tape that his father made six months earlier. On the tape is an interview taken by an employee of a holocaust museum. As the son stands in his kitchen and listens to the tape, he is stunned and amazed at what he learns about his father and regrets they never had this talk in person.

Attention: this move (visa) is a concept move not art move because I make this film without cameraman, without makeup artist, without Lighting , without sound recordist , with Non-actors and with Pocket camera , … And with at a cost of under $ 50 so please I need Practical criticism. thanks-
Ali is a young writer live alone. he don’t write to much. Ali have a friend, name is ( reza ) reza knows ali don’t write to much but he give a offer job to ali (writing a scenario for TV series) and reza promises ali can make a good money if he agreement that offer job. but ali don’t write for money!. reza know that!. Reza knows some of ali artistic works, not going to finish!. some things like disagreement!. Ali is so angry for that. ali is angry about this situation and he want to going some place he can write, or get some good work or job!. and for that he need to get a visa. image:image.image:title: Get Live (Official Selection to IndieWise Virtual Festival)
image:image.image:caption:
“Get Live” music video is a surrealistic and ironic story, set in a dystopian world where any individuality is suppressed, and among many rules, loose hair is a taboo. An absurd dry land synchronized swimming team is being evaluated by the representatives of a totalitarian government. To their surprise, performance doesn't go as planned. The video is a creative collaboration between the director Adriana Roze and Latvian electronic music group “Bandmaster”, featuring Akil the MC from American hip hop group “Jurassic 5”.
It's an Official Selection to IndieWise Virtual Festival.

image:image.image:title: Impossible Princesses - Transgenders in Brazil
image:image.image:caption:
Brazil is currently the country with the highest number of hate crimes against transgender people. Over 90% of this population depends on prostitution to survive and this debate is seldom made among the public, even in the LGBT movement. This documentary portrays the lives and struggles of transgender people in Brazil and explains their complex ways of self-identification
Youtube link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Kh9w6PuqIg
Original Portuguese version on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qz4ZANLcwPU

image:image.image:title: The Province
image:image.image:caption: The Province is the story of Martin Hamet, an ordinary mechanic and veteran of the Northern Ireland conflict. When Martin receives news that an old friend from the army has taken his own life due to trauma received from the troubles. Old wounds open, and the memories Martin has spent twenty years trying to forget soon begin to surface. From the safety of the present day to the trouble torn streets of 1992 Belfast. We follow Martin as he tries to piece his fractured past back together.

image:image.image:title: Tony Windberg. A Painter in the Woods
image:image.image:caption: In the midst of a vast Eucalyptus forest that lies deep in the heart of the great southern region of Western Australia, sits a cottage filled with test tubes, material samples, drafts, notes, indexed color samples and canvasses reflecting their surroundings: the trees. Simply calling Tony Windberg a Landscape Artist falls short of the true essence of his work. Charcoals of burnt trees, the bark and resin of various Eucalyptus trees and the soil in which they grow and die are all transformed into materials for his works of art in long, well documented procesess of experimentation. In addition to natural materials, Windberg utilises vinyl flooring, its varnish mimicking wood, onto which he applies a unique method of engraving complex patterns of lines to represent the impact of the timber industry on old growth forrests and the trail left behind by logging. Windberg‘s artwork, just as the materials that his art is made of and with, swings between untouched nature and human altered landscapes. At the center of his work is the tree, which is depicted in a way that represents the unease of the altered Australian landscape yet is delivered in a highly aesthetic manner that seduces the beholder at first glance with all of nature’s beauty. Windberg’s vast application of styles and multi-award winning artwork is displayed widely across numerous corporate, public and private collections within Australia. He lives and works in Northcliffe, Western Australia. more on Tony Windberg: tonywindberg.com/ MUSIC: I Feel You, Comfortable Mystery 1-4 by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) SCRIPT, SHOT, EDITED: Thomas Schumacher © 2014 gernemehrfilm.de Thanks to Rafael Jovine for the Spanish subtitles.

image:image.image:title: The 50 Yard Dash
image:image.image:caption:
This quirky and silly mockumentary, starring two-time Silver Fox Award winner Kaitlyn Murphy, follows a day in the lives of twenty-something undergraduates. With graduation quickly approaching, college roommates and best friends Lauren and Allie must come to terms with their post-grad lives going in opposite directions. Directed by Rachael Black and Devin Barbaro, this short film explores the pressure and emotions of four years of college coming to a close, reminding us that the most important thing we’ll take away from our higher education is the memories we've made.
IMDb: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt5648904/?ref_=nm_flmg_eddp_8 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/The50YardDash/?view_public_for=165280693866979

image:image.image:title: Oblivion
image:image.image:caption: Sophie is a young ambitious woman who wants to become a real writer. She has got a last chance to write a bestseller or she'll be out of a job. As she begins to write she becomes too focused on her book and her real life is pulled out from under her feet. She tries to find out what is going on, but she's not able to realize what is real and what is her imagination. This is a film about writers and all types of artists whose art becomes their only life.

image:image.image:title: My Fair Lady & The Trump
image:image.image:caption:
An animated short film poking fun at Donald Trump, also starring Holly Golightly! Holly is summoned by the Trumpster to "hip-up" his hairstyle, but little does Donny remember.. they have crossed paths before. Revenge, is a dish best served gold!
Packed full of laughs and a doozy of a soundtrack, Lady & The Trump will surely leave you with a smile on your face. Whether you're a Trump supporter or not- you're in for a wild ride! This was a FINALIST in the LA Cinefest this year, very proud of this accomplishment!

As he revisits this world, his state of mind is altered and his mothers past, present and future are laid out bare before him.
image:image.image:geo_location: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

image:image.image:title: BONGSHOJO ~ The Descendant
image:image.image:caption: It is only when a man, with the sole intention of bringing joy and happiness to his family and loved ones, and retain his self esteem, overlooks his self interest and silently swallows the poison of life, that he transcends from being a mere human to that of a divine personage. Manab, who is under treatment and awaiting fatherhood shortly, learns that the baby growing in his wife, Neera’s womb belongs to his brother. Despite his irritation on wife’s behaviour, he keeps this secret under wrap, with a self consolation that the baby bears lineal blood though not born of his own, which would otherwise not have been possible. In an unguarded moment, Manab pours out the contentions of his agitated mind to a local shopkeeper. Notwithstanding the fact that he is physically incapable of being a biological father, he is aware that there are other modern techniques of enjoying paternity. Therefore he finds his wife’s abrupt action unacceptable. He holds himself equally responsible for the lack of emotional bond he shares with his wife. But here too, Manab selects someone to whom he confides his indictments, is dumb and deaf. Gulping the venom of resentment he prepares himself to welcome his lineal descendant.

image:image.image:title: CLAUSTROPHOBIA
image:image.image:caption: Claustrophobia is the fear of being in closed or small space or room and having no escape.[1] It can be triggered by many situations or stimuli, including elevators crowded to capacity, windowless rooms, and even tight-necked clothing.[2] It is typically classified as an anxiety disorder, which often results in panic attacks. The onset of claustrophobia has been attributed to many factors, including a reduction in the size of the amygdala, classical conditioning, or a genetic predisposition to fear small spaces.

image:image.image:title: Self Control - Trailer

image:image.image:title: The Saga Of Video Bob
image:image.image:caption: We all have that one video store we used to go, back when video stores were a thing, and we used to rent big fat rectangles to shove in VCRs. The simpler time when Netflix and chill was unheard of, when one had not a library of digital horrible films at their fingertips, but a library of horrible films they could rent maybe one or two from for the night. And this library is the property of one Video Bob. Jim and Bill are two unassuming everyman, out for some entertainment, and when they discover the greatest film ever made lurking in their local store, they know exactly what they're after. But if they think they can pull a fat one on Video Bob, well, then shit's gonna get real ugly real fast!

A look at Nepal with the position of the photographer-mountain enthusiast, for whom the journey is the reward. Nepali population beset with poverty and disaster creates an periphrastic picture, which weaves ancient culture with daily existence in difficult conditions which dictates the power of nature and the economic situation of a region of the Old Kingdom.

image:image.image:title: Bring the cat back home!
image:image.image:caption:
Why cats cannot have a journey in cosmos? Dogs, monkeys, rats and even tritons - all they got their space flight. But cats did not! One day France was going to send a cat to the Earth orbit. But this unruly cat escaped before the start. So they had to send another cat instead. Ok, this second one finally got the flight, but anyway run away after her spaceship safely landed. In one word cats are rebellious creatures which prefer to escape of any strange situation.
Also cats have troubles with zero gravity. If they get into it, they just are swirling and whirling and even twirling in the vain trying to stand on their 4 feet as they usually use to do. But this damn gravity doesn't give them a chance!
So that's the reason why cats don't take a fly to cosmos. There is no any pleasure for them in that! :)

image:image.image:title: Home
image:image.image:caption:
Directors: Emre ÖZERDEN & Emre Zengineken
'Home' is a place of unconditional bond for each individual. Our film examines the family which is the smallest community with this idea and criticizes deterioration of society and blurring of the values. While four siblings who strap the selfish way of life meet in a funeral home and recall them to their roots, the invisible people are suddenly become visible.
The siblings with vulnerable relationship meet at the funeral when their mother died. The neighbors clear away after they expressed their condolences and they were left alone at home alone where they grew up. Serkan opens the subject that all are curious about; he recommends a nursing home care for their father. The debate grows strongly with the rejection of Melda. Everyone blames each other. Their father was in the room when all this happens. While they are arguing, he places the favorite their mother’s record ad plays. The siblings hear the song and freeze. They all look at each other with embarrassment when Tolga says “Mum!”.g

image:image.image:title: The Tango - music video
image:image.image:caption: This amazing dance was born in the end of XIX century, when in search of happiness and a better life in Buenos Aires began to arrive immigrants from Europe , tormented by hunger and wars . And, as a reminder of the country, in addition to musical instruments, they carried with them the musical traditions and dances of their countries. Tango fully embodies all the emotional intensity , the power of people's experiences. However, the audience is not always visible to the emotions that rage inside performers, sometimes their emotions hide more than the human eye can see .

image:image.image:title: Broken Phone

(PASSWORD: 29032016)
During a night out, Sílvia sees Daniel, a young upper class adult, vomit in the street after leaving a nightclub. Sílvia calls immediately Carolina, her friend, to tell what she saw. A communications sequence is triggered, through an ex-girlfriend of Daniel, a homosexual couple that known him, and even people who only knew him by sight. image:image.image:title: 4242 (trailer)
image:image.image:caption:
Multi-award winning short film, directed by Portuguese young filmmaker Sara Eustaquio, 16. So far, '4242' got so far 24 international awards, 18 nominations and was officially selected for 67 international film festivals in 22 countries.
Synopsis: Cristi has just moved to an unknown country, far away from family and friends. At first, she is happy for the challenge. But soon she begins to question her place in this new world that seems to be a lost town, made of absences, distances, silence and indifference. '4242' is the story of a young female immigrant, a story of a teenager's anguish who is trying to redefine her identity after being forced to leave home.

image:image.image:title: Asphyxia
image:image.image:caption:
ASK FOR PASSWORD - "In the next future, Emily, Michael and Connor are forced to flee and take refuge in a mausoleum in ruins. They are led by a soldier, Ivan. From the headland we can see the half-ruined city. The refugees are preparing to set off to find their family members. Their memories waking and sleeping show us how they had to begin to live constantly with oxygen canisters and why they had to flee. A form of pollution, still unknown to all ordinary citizens, is multiplying its effects in the soil, in the water, in the air, and it’s starting to shake the skies. The Earth's crust is suffering and reacts taking away the lifeblood: the oxygen...".
The most important objective is to make a feature film on this theme. The far-sighted idea is to make a film for all of the elements: AIR ("Asphyxia"), SOIL, WATER, FIRE, AND THE FIFTH ELEMENT. Everything is within the theme of the impending apocalypse caused by pollution, very current and fervent theme in the world at this historical moment. The Pitch: the original idea is different and much richer. I wrote a film treatment/script (with no dialogues) for a feature film. Then I did an adaptation to shoot an independent short film. Otherwise the objective is to find the way TO MAKE THIS SHORT FILM BECOME A MARKETABLE FILM, by shooting 30 MINUTES MORE. Ask for the Pitch and more information.

image:image.image:title: Paris Paralleles
image:image.image:caption: It all started when we noticed that Parisians constantly complain about their city, but they are proud of it and can't to see themselves living anywhere else. Why, then, do they stay in a polluted, noisy and expensive city? A city that does not always offer a good quality of life. Where does this contradiction come from? We therefore decided to make a profile of the youth of Paris (approximately age 18-35) by looking at the complex everyday relationship that young Parisians have with this metropolis.

image:image.image:title: Moonbears on Planet Earth
image:image.image:caption: The Tam Dao National Park, North Vietnam. Through interviews and archive material we learn about the activities of Animalasia, an NGO that cares for moonbears saved from the torture of extracting their bile, an ingredient in traditional oriental medicines. Through the efforts of Animalasia this practice has been declared illegal. Year of production: 2016 Running Time: 24’ 05” Country of production: Italy Language: English/Vietnamese Directors: Nadia Zanellato, Andrea Daddi Screenplay: Nadia Zanellato DoP: Andrea Daddi O.S.T.: Esa Ruoho aka Lackluster Titles: Fabrizio Bonaga Illustrator: Serena Gamba

image:image.image:title: A WOUND THAT NEVER HEALS (SHORT DOC)

Two actors, a camera, and an award winning story.
A Wound That Never Heals.
But what you are about to witness is real life. The real deal. Raw, honest accounts of what it's like to have a loved one incarcerated. Welcome to their world. Now we hope upon entering this world you leave behind any preconceived notions and allow yourself the freedom of an open mind. For it's one thing to point out all the problems, it surely is another to offer the solutions.

image:image.image:title: Explain to me (the Syrian War)
image:image.image:caption:
Syria’s civil war is the worst humanitarian crisis of our time. Half the country’s pre-war population — more than 11 million people — have been killed or forced to flee their homes.
Families are struggling to survive inside Syria, or make a new home in neighboring countries. Others are risking their lives on the way to Europe, hoping to find acceptance and opportunity.
How did this crisis start? Anti-government demonstrations began in March of 2011, part of the Arab Spring. But the peaceful protests quickly escalated after the government's violent crackdown, and rebels began fighting back against the regime.
By July, army defectors had loosely organized the Free Syrian Army and many civilian Syrians took up arms to join the opposition. Divisions between secular and Islamist fighters, and between ethnic groups, continue to complicate the politics of the conflict.
Almost five years after it began, the full-blown civil war has killed over 220,000 people, half of whom are believed to be civilians. Bombings are destroying crowded cities and horrific human rights violations are widespread. Basic necessities like food and medical care are sparse.
The future of Syria depends on its youth, but war has put their lives and dreams on hold. Once they dreamed of lives as artists, doctors and teachers. But after five years of war, Syria’s youth are a generation trapped.
Explain to me (the Syrian War). © 2016 selfdefensefreepress.
ALL IMAGES & VIDEO ARE LICENSED UNDER CREATIVE COMMONS.

image:image.image:title: Static
image:image.image:caption: Trisha, Molly and Jason are presenting their regular weekly show at the Firehot Radio Station when they notice that their studio drivers suddenly run out the suite. The three presenters try to use their phones to contact others out of the suite but are unable to get any phone signal. Fearful of what they might encounter if they are to leave the radio suite, they sit and wait for hours. Frustrated at Trisha and Jason constant bickering Molly snap. Fed up with being in stuck for hours with Jason, Trisha leads the decision for them to escape and unblocks the door. Unknown to all three, the gunman is on back on their floor and hears bickering again to which he approaches their door and shocks Trisha, Molly and Jason
image:image.image:geo_location: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

image:image.image:title: Red Point - Episode 2 : Red Dragons

image:image.image:title: THEEYE - The Fire
image:image.image:caption: Theeye (the fire) is an experiment. We all spend so much time,effort and money to groom and care our body. But what the whole world is forgetting is,these bodies are just walls behind which our souls play hide and seek. And we totally conceive that we are these bodies. But the reality is, we are the Souls. All the insecurities,frustrations,depression and fears are messages from the soul that it needs care..it needs more love and affection. And the cure for all the chaos happening around on this planet is, 'self realization'. take care of your souls.. pass on the warmth.. the fire within.. and get rid of all that pain u r suffering right now.

image:image.image:title: Asphyxia Trailer
image:image.image:caption:
"In the next future, Emily, Michael and Connor are forced to flee and take refuge in a mausoleum in ruins. They are led by a soldier, Ivan. From the headland we can see the half-ruined city. The refugees are preparing to set off to find their family members. Their memories waking and sleeping show us how they had to begin to live constantly with oxygen canisters and why they had to flee. A form of pollution, still unknown to all ordinary citizens, is multiplying its effects in the soil, in the water, in the air, and it’s starting to shake the skies. The Earth's crust is suffering and reacts taking away the lifeblood: the oxygen...".
The most important objective is to make a feature film on this theme. The far-sighted idea is to make a film for all of the elements: AIR ("Asphyxia"), SOIL, WATER, FIRE, AND THE FIFTH ELEMENT. Everything is within the theme of the impending apocalypse caused by pollution, very current and fervent theme in the world at this historical moment. The Pitch: the original idea is different and much richer. I wrote a film treatment/script (with no dialogues) for a feature film. Then I did an adaptation to shoot an independent short film. Otherwise the objective is to find the way TO MAKE THIS SHORT FILM BECOME A MARKETABLE FILM, by shooting 30 MINUTES MORE. Ask for the Pitch and more information.

image:image.image:title: PRIESTESS OF THE GATE
image:image.image:caption: 'Priestess of the Gate' is an abstract music presentation of a young woman representing the soul searcher in all of us taking an ethereal walk through light, love, peace and restoration.

image:image.image:title: Kaaval - Under the watchul eyes
image:image.image:caption: An adventure, thriller take on a very realistic story from the fantasy genre. The story revolves around a young forest guard and a certain life changing experience he had with a Bengal tiger, on his first official posting in the tropical forests of wayanad.The story begins from the guard's perspective, about his outlook on life, his job and the importance of preserving forests.The story then takes a turn when one day he hears a gun shot from deep inside the forest and pursues it.The very surrealistic experience he shares later on with a ferocious Bengal tiger; and how the vision of a self fulfilling prophecy, change his life forever. Only other characters in this short-film is the antagonist poacher, veeran alias veeramahishi , a fabled rebirth of an asura from Hindu mythology. Finally the central and most important character, satpathi, a probable avatar of Lord Indra, depicted as a member of the local tribe. He is also presumed to be shape shifting into 'The Tiger' which takes Shabari through a maze of surrealistic visions.

image:image.image:title: THE RUNNER

But before he run to Athens bearing the message of victory the Runner went to Sparta, a distance of 220km from Athens to ask for help.On his way home, the Runner met the god Pan. The Runner is 2D black and white hand drawn animated short.with a 6 minute duration consisting of 140 individual shots with 170 background and foreground elements. Animated and directed by Zachos Samoladas, original music by Christos Stanisis

image:image.image:title: Buen Camino
image:image.image:caption: For ages thousands of pilgrims walk away, carrying backpacks and thoughts, finding themselves through the Santiago path. Shots and thoughts in the walking experience of the "Camino". 785 Km in 32 days, between April 30th and June 1st 2015 ••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••• legendas (cc) em português e espanhol ••••••• Por séculos milhares de peregrinos caminham, carregando mochilas e pensamentos, encontrando a si mesmos através do Caminho de Santiago. Imagens e pensamentos da experiência de fazer o "Camino". Foram 785 Km, entre 30 de abril a 1 de junho de 2015. ••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••• A short film by Peter Cordenonsi Written and Created by Michel Gagnon, Peter Cordenonsi and Terri McCarley Music: "Sunday Drive", by Silent Partner (ambience) Shot on iPhone 5s Duration: 2' 31" Spain • Brazil • 2015 facebook.com/integralfilmes • integralfilmes.com

image:image.image:title: Cluster
image:image.image:caption: Cluster is a short animated film about the life of a young adult suffering from cluster headaches,his struggles,which is not only the pain but also loneliness and depression. This also illustrates the isolated life and detached being of an individual with a serious problem. The problem is defined and judged by a world which does not understand, and labelled as ‘a headache’. It shows how the demon cluster has taken everything he loves away and stripped him of his desire to live.Finally, he confronts the demon the only way he feels he can.
image:image.image:geo_location: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

image:image.image:title: Naleena
image:image.image:caption: In indian culture transgenders, called Hijras, belong to the so-called "third sex", neither man nor woman. Hijras have an ancient history dating back to the seventh century before Christ. As an offering to the Goddess Kali, they undergo the ritual emasculation, carried out in secret because illegal, and without anesthesia, by the Thaaiamma, a kind of sacred midwife. Through this surgery Hijras renounce a specific gender, as the male organ is cut off and in its place is not made no reconstruction of the female organ, as is normal in modern surgery. This is the reason why they are called "non-gender specific", "third sex" or "shemales". Traditionally considered sacred beings because daughters and priestesses of Kali Matha, Hijras live actually like outcasts, even at a lower level than the caste of Pariah, and to survive the majority of them is forced to beg and sex work.

image:image.image:title: Al en vers
Dead's Circus
image:image.image:caption:
In Bangladesh, Accidents are frequent phenomena now-a-days,and we fall victim of it regularly. that is why even death has become natural and meagre,in one sense a weapon of convenience. Social values and duties have got a synonym called fairy tales.Political turmoil and bureaucracy are traumatizing public life.Our works only depict the proverb ''every man for himself"'. Society has turned into a neifelheim where gratification is dominant,ethics conceals itself in the suffocating cell of anarchic rule. In fact in the final conversation it is quite evident that the whole story is Yellow Journalism and a creation of the reporter.
It is like a dead society where melodrama is presented by the dead's.

image:image.image:title: Frozen rose - short film of love and infidelity.
image:image.image:caption:
Web of the short film: http://www.marcnadal.com/frozen-rose Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/director.marc.nadal
"Frozen Rose" a short film directed by Marc Nadal. Year: 2011. Drama. Cast: Jesús Sesma, Alba Ferrara and Christian Guiriguet.
Plot: The passage of time and monotony, a marriage between opposite ends to create an unbridgeable distance. He has formed a stable life and hates his wife repeatedly and fight with all means at its disposal to change. A struggle of resistance that creates terrible situations.
Festivales y menciones del cortometraje: Estrenado en el Cinema Catalunya en Febrero de 2011. Finalista en el Festival Baumann c.02 a la Mejor Obra Local de la Sección Oficial (2011). Sección Oficial del festival Cortos con Ñ. Sección Oficial del 8º Festival Internacional de cine de Pasto, FICPA 2012. (Colombia). Sección Oficial del festival "Festival de cine" de Sant Vicenç de Castellet. Sección Oficial de la muestra de cortometrajes de Poblenou (2011). Sección Oficial de Chulpicine 2011. Festival de Cine Infantil y Juvenil de Quito. Ecuador. Noviembre. Seleccionado en el 8º festival de Cine Inusual de Buenos Aires. Foco "Marc Nadal". Uno de los filmes adscritos a la red de distribución de cineclubs de Portugal y de Catalunya durante 2012, accediendo a las más de 120 pantallas que la componen. Muestra en el Cine Club Aula Clavijero "Una Mirada en Corto" de Xalapa (México). Muestra internacional, nacional y local "Una Mirada en Corto" de Tuxpan (México). Emisión en el programa Toma1-cortos que conduce Analía Grosso y se emite por ZONA31 (canal de televisión regional de Buenos Aires). Proyectado en el cine fórum de la Associació Lgtb Talcomsom.
Note: Short film starring Jesús Sesma, Espectáculos Tauro founder and star of the short film "Therapy", Alba Ferrara, star of the film "A criminal history" of Joseph Duran, and Christian Guiriguet actor who has made several short films and appeared in television series. Written and directed by Marc Nadal.

image:image.image:title: In front of the spider - A short film by Marc Nadal.
image:image.image:caption:
Web of the short film: http://www.marcnadal.com/in-front-of-the-spider
"In front of the Spider" a short film directed by Marc Nadal. Cast: Montserrat Ocaña and Rosa Nicolás. Drama. 2011. Runtime: 15 min.
Plot: The small Centaur told to Carolina that before coming to Mount Peace had to traverse the maze of spiders. A small place but full of corridors at the end of which lived a spider, but one that led to the exit.
Short film in Festivals: Finalista en II Tracce Cinematografiche Film Festival (Italia). Finalista en la Sección Oficial Made in Barcelona del festival BccN (2012). Finalista en IX Efebo Corto Film Festival (Italia). Nominación a mejor actriz Montserrat Ocaña en el festival Cortos Por Amor al Arte. A coruña (2013). Sección Oficial del festival Cortos Por Amor al Arte. A coruña (2013). Sección Oficial del Festival Internacional Cinematográfico de Toluca (México). Sección Oficial del festival Internacional de Cortometrajes Vagón 2012 (México). Sección Oficial de la 4 edición del Festival Internacional Pilas en corto. Sección Oficial del festival Cineseptiembre 2012. Sección Oficial del Festival Daroca&Prision Film Fest. Sección Oficial de Porcuna Creative Commons Film Festival 2012 (España). Sección Oficial del II Festival La nit més curta 2013 (España). Sección Oficial del I Concurso de cortos de ficción: Luis Buñuel, Zaragoza. Sección Oficial del festival internacional El Cine en la Cumbre, Tajín (México, 2013). Sección Oficial del festival "Festival de cine" de Sant Vicenç de Castellet. Seleccionado en el Festival Cine//B_5, sección Corto Resto del Mundo (Chile). Seleccionado en la 11ª Muestra Internacional "Video Jujuy Cortos 2012? (Argentina). Seleccionado en el 8º festival de cine inusual de Buenos Aires. Foco "Marc Nadal". Seleccionado en Muestra oficial de Cine a la Calle 2012 (Colombia). Seleccionado en la red de programación de la Federación de Cineclubes de Galicia. Seleccionado para la Muestra "Una Mirada en Corto" de Tuxpan (México). Seleccionado para la Muestra "Una Mirada en Corto" de Xalapa (México). 4º video más visto de la semana en Dailymotion con 14.052 visionados. Emisión en televisión programa "Noche en corto" por Canal Extremadura. Emisión en el programa Toma1-cortos emitido por ZONA31 (canal de televisión regional de Buenos Aires). image:image.image:title: AsphyxiA- Trailer
image:image.image:caption: ‘’AsphyxiA’’ is a short film about suppressed memories. A man who doesn’t have the power to confront his oppressive memories and trauma; in a mysterious way, he finally gets a chance for catharsis through a painful process. Some psychoanalysts claim that trash in our dreams is a symbol of our memories. Hermes takes a refreshing bath; a bath that turns into a nightmare, when the pure clean water gets covered by rubbish, which suffocates him. A different, “empty” world unfolds for him. He trusts a mysterious woman who promises him catharsis via a peculiar way. His traumas are going to be relieved by recapturing and confronting a bunch of memories that have been suffocating him for many years. He has to get rid of this rubbish. It’s a film where the borders between space, time and reality are blurred.

image:image.image:title: TATTOO (password: 1996)
image:image.image:caption: “Tattoo” is a symbolic short film, inspired by the Prometheus myth. Marina, decides to come out to her parents as a lesbian in the middle of a usual Sunday lunch. Her dad kicks her out. The question is what she is going to decide after this heartbreaking incident. “Tattoo” in the Samoan dialect means ”the correct one”. Traumatic experiences are like tattoos. Also , like a tattoo, traumas can symbolize different things. It’s a story about human vulnerability. Also this film broaches patriarchy, homosexuality issues and tradition, family models. *Prometheus, in eternal punishment, is chained to a rock in the Caucasus, Kazbek Mountain or Mountain of Khvamli, where his liver is eaten daily by an eagle, only to be regenerated by night, due to his immortality. The eagle is a symbol of Zeus himself. Years later, the Greek hero Heracles (Hercules) slays the eagle and frees Prometheus from the eagle’s torment.

image:image.image:title: Epistemic Space | Trailer
image:image.image:caption: April 2015. A crowd of thousands marches across Istiklal street. The main slogan being: We are here. This same street that saw the riots of Gezi, those of May 1s, the same street that led to the cemetery of those long gone, was now full of Armenians from around the world marching and chanting while the souls of hundreds lay beneath them. But a few days after the centennial, most left and so what was to become of the Armenians of Turkey?

image:image.image:title: Bloody Bastards
image:image.image:caption: Mr. Cryer is a self –destructive guy who sells tears to desperate ladies. He unexpectedly meets a woman who is emotionally dead and wants to feel strong feelings . She doesn’t care if it’s pain or love but he knows that he would hate himself so badly if he could hurt a woman who doesn’t even feel pain. Is this meeting going to be “life changing”? Did they really settle their desires? Just remember that the key word is “dream”. It’s a surreal film noir that is setted in the boundaries of dream. The characters have no past, no explanation about their relationship etc ,such as the dreamy space that is super fluid . Everything is mirror

11 September 2001: It’s a day like any other in Naples but soon an event, that is destined to remain ingrained forever in our collective unconscious, will burst. Everyone is immersed in their daily chores, until the distant tragedy slips into everyone’s life with different outcomes.
11 settembre 2001: A Napoli è un giorno qualsiasi, ma sta per irrompere un evento destinato a fissarsi per sempre nella memoria collettiva. Tutti sono immersi nelle loro storie, fino a quando la tragedia lontana scivola nella vita di ognuno, con esiti diversi.

Plot: Amelia, Stefano, Marcello, Irene, four strangers who together form an explosive mix. Marcello, is the computer expert with an unmentionable secret; Irene, is the metalhead perpetually on the verge of dismissal; Amelia, is the bored librarian who aspires to something better and Stefano, is the beautiful and damned. A reshuffle the cards in the game of what seems like a typical fresco of young people struggling with the failures and choices in life comes something mysterious, sometimes supernatural, the persistent feeling of being followed, scrutinized, hunted. Between research, chases and daring escapes, nine episodes that will leave you in suspense. We have a great news for the foreign audience, the series will be available also with english subtitle.

image:image.image:title: Point No Point
image:image.image:caption:
In Roman mythology a deity that protects a certain place was called the “genius loci“. Nowadays this term describes rather some kind of an atmosphere or a spirit that is inherent in a place. This spirit is created and strongly influenced by persons who live at this place. So is the spirit and atmosphere of a city mainly a product created by it’s inhabitants.
In times of increasing internal conflicts the city has become the main venue for violent conflicts. The reasons for conflicts in urban environments are very different in this world, but they have one thing in common: people have to give up their homes, their cities.
While in the western world the reasons are mainly gentrification and social injustice, in other parts of the world the reasons are war and expulsion.
This film is about the „genius loci“, the spirit of the city, that is fighting together with it’s inhabitants against the city’s destruction and for keeping this home and living environment alive. The spirit and the city are strongly threatened by a dark power that is questioning the life and existence of this place, therefore the title is “Point No Point“.

image:image.image:title: Dying for life
image:image.image:caption: its a film based on thalassemia. thalassemia major is disease in which patient have to transfuse blood on the regular basis throughout the life, this film is for awareness to those who even don't know what is thalassemia, please go for the blood test before marriage to avoid this inherited disease to your children.

image:image.image:title: UnFriends - Episode 1: The Campaign (Pilot)
image:image.image:caption:
Video stores are gone and platinum records don't exist, but a channel online can get a hundred million views and a kid in a bedroom with a webcam and an idea can become an A-list celebrity in a matter of months.
Plot:
The online world gets a bit more interesting after Paul creates an online persona and a viral video campaign that sparks a rivalry with the web's number one star.

image:image.image:title: Hard Rain
image:image.image:caption:
This Film is inspired by the song "A Hard Rain's A-Gonna Fall" by Bob Dylan. Dylan wrote this song in the year 1962. The world was at that time highly threatened because of the Cuban Missile Crisis, therefore he wrote a song that thematized the imminent destruction of the world. Dylan said he was afraid he wouldn't have enough time alive to write songs again so he put all he could into this one.
The imminent destruction of the world is the main topic of this film. Message and atmosphere of the song should be transferred into a film without using the song itself in it. Many of the song's motifs were concentrated in the film on one certain place: a party. This party is to be understood as an end–of–the–world–party.
The film shows a world in which people are highly infused by data and codes. In the year 1962 the codes to launch atomic weapons would have been send on a special radio frequency. While data and codes where in the year 1962 something special, in our today's engineered world we are always surrounded by data and codes.
This data can transport and mean anything from banal news to rocket launch codes. Therefore it fits very well that Dylan said the "Hard Rain" should not be interpreted as atomic fallout, but as the influence of media and information.

image:image.image:title: Reflection Official Teaser
image:image.image:caption: The story shot in a completely different way revolves around the life of an innocent young girl who lives with her brother & their grandfather, a simple glassmaker, in their small home. Caught between a transition of T.V culture and tradition the young girl is drawn toward the charms of an older boy. Their lives are plunged into the ethos of a grim world by a gruesome and unfortunate incident and like a ripple it plays itself to the finish until only two remain as mere spectators to the bad dream..

image:image.image:title: Jellyfish
image:image.image:caption:
Micheal wakes up on a beach, no idea how or why he is there, only to find his son waiting for him. Not everything is as it seems, as the life he knows is turned upside as two worlds bleed into each other.
This was made as part of the 3rd year BA Hons Creative Industries Film and Video Degree at the University of South Wales.
Won Best Direction (Student) at Monthly Film Festival Nominated Best Web Short - London Shortpole International Film Festival Nominated Best Short Film - Short of The Month Nominated Best Film Poster - Short of The Month Won the Audience Award Best Film @Chapter Cinema - USW Graduation Showcase 2016

image:image.image:title: Adori Office: Two Ships (music video)
image:image.image:caption:
Music video for the song 'Two Ships' by electro-psych-pop duo Adori Office based in Budapest, Hungary.
'Two Ships' follows two mysterious figures who may or may not be the members of the band. They appear here and there but don't move much at all. Soon they start bringing on images of ships and lighthouses by the means of 'reverse destruction'. Everything happens under purposely (hopefully) eerie/weird circumstances. 'Two Ships' is a love song, executed in a less than usual way.
Shot in one day in Solymar, Hungary. Equipment used: Canon 650D, GoPro Hero 4 Black, iPhone 6S+, iPhone 6S. Drawings and masks used in this short piece were created by friends and family out of their pure enthusiasm. The film crew worked on a pro-bono basis so the total cost came to be around a mere USD 100.

image:image.image:title: This is Life
image:image.image:caption: Rashid lives in a house by the sea in Bodrum. He has been spending much time on the balcony lately because he is watching the sea all the time. While he is having breakfast one day, he notices a movement in the sea. He storms out of the house and gets on his bike. He arrives at the harbor to go sailing with his close friend Captain Cavit. The reason for the movement in the sea is the Syrian refugees trying to get to a Greek island. Upon arrival at the scene, they understand that they have been late to intervene. They cannot find anyone alive on the surface of the water; refugees’ belongings are the only things floating in the sea. Ra?it is stricken by this image and unexpectedly starts to collect the clothing floating on the surface. He then goes home to hang the clothes up on the balcony to let them dry. We see him nailing pieces of wood together and digging the earth. He nails the woods together and starts to dress them with the clothes he has collected from the sea. He takes photos and writes down the words which sink our hearts. “This person might have been you ! Yourself !” “This person might have been your brother!” “This person might have been your mother or father!”His purpose is to attract attention to this unfortunate incident with an intense language and make people more sensitive about our refugee brothers and sisters. He does this in the most clear, striking way. He adds the photos to his Facebook account that he can barely use. He cannot believe what he sees the next morning because the photos have reached places and people Ra?it cannot think of, and brought them altogether.

image:image.image:title: Turn away from the mirror - trailer
image:image.image:caption: What we see when we turn away from the mirror? When does the old age come? Heroes of this film are women from «Anti-wrinkle cure» project. It was organized by charity shop «Spasibo!» (St. Petersburg, Russia) for people over 70. Target of this project was excurse for old people to youth world – world of contemporary art and fashion. However, «When we were young…» - is not about our participants. They are young and beautiful now, but we must just hear to them.
